11.content:
The alarm beside her bed buzzed to life. It was too early, she wanted more sleep! She pulled a pillow over her head to mute the sound but it tore in two, stuffing scattered throughout the room, slowly raining down to join the clutter on the floor. The shredded pillow only added to her ire as the alarm continued. She rolled over and smacked the clock like she had a million times before but this time the clock exploded from the force of her blow, bits of hard plastic shot in all directions like shrapnel.
She shot upright and raked her long blonde hair out of her face. What the hell was going on?
She shook the sleep from her head. The destruction of the clock and the pillow slowly began to register. Before she formed any concrete thoughts her bedroom door flew open.
"Get up you lazy cow, your going to be late for school!"
She shrieked as she pulled her sheet around here. He elder brother under the pretense of making sure she was awake was trying to sneak a peek at her again. The sheet tore apart in her hands like wet tissue giving John an unobstructed view of his naked younger sister.
She was anything but a cow. She was not very tall standing only 5 foot 3 in her bare feet, she was trim but well proportioned. Her golden blonde hair reached passed her neck resting on her shoulder blades in back, or brushing the tops of her boobs on the front. Her bra size was only 34 B but on her small body they looked much larger. She had shapely hips and a well rounded butt, she filled out her clothes in a way that made most males want to peer under them for a better look.
Holding the halves of the sheet she sat in shock.
"Whoa, you better get this cleaned up before mom gets home. She will freak if she sees the way you've torn up your room." John took one more long look as Cindy covered herself with her hands. Slowly he left her room and went downstairs for breakfast.
Breaking everything she touched left her too stunned to be angry at John. It was her fault really, he was just taking advantage of it. She hated wearing clothes to bed. Her parents caught her sleeping in the nude a couple years ago and hit the roof. They demanded that she sleep in something, a long tee-shirt at least. To avoid fighting with them she usually did as they asked but now and then she gave in to her dark desire to feel nothing but skin between her and the sheets.
She considered it freaky that her parents would sometimes sneak into her room to check on what she had worn to bed. It was bad when it was mom, but so much worse when dad spied on her, especially on the nights she opted to wear nothing.
Alone again she slipped out of bed taking her shirt off the back of the chair where she'd left it. She stretched it out to pull it on but it ripped as she held it. What the hell? Had all her clothes rotted overnight? She knew she needed to buy some new things but this was ridiculous. Maybe John was pranking her. She often wondered if he came into her room during the night for a peak too. She was a very sound sleeper. Maybe he weakened the threads of her clothes somehow?
She carefully selected different clothes and was relieved that they didn't fall apart at her tough. Whatever had been happening seemed to be over. It was too late now to take a shower. Her first class at South High was PE anyway, she would have to shower afterward anyway. She filled her bag with clean clothes and ran to the bus stop to met her friend Julie.
She debated if she should tell her about her morning or not?

111.content:
Julie was standing at the stop sucking one of her long fingernails impatiently waiting for life to amuse her.
Cindy smiled. It life didn’t amuse her Julie would do something to amuse herself. She felt sorry for whoever was her chosen victim today.
“Hi Slut, are you trying to miss the bus?”
Cindy called back to her BFF, “Whatever Skank. I’m not in a hurry to get to prison, I’m surprised you are?”
After exchanging acidic greetings the two friends hugged. Julie let out a muffled moan of pain. “No so rough, I’m not into pain-play.”
“Sorry, I didn’t know you were so fragile.”
Julie stepped away, a little confused and a little annoyed. She decided to change the subject. “Not funny. So did you get finished with Mrs. Idlebrooks paper yet? It’s due today.”
“I’ll be done by class, what about you. Last I heard you hadn’t started. You are so toast!”
Julie was a dark haired beauty with olive skin. At 5 foot 6 is towered over her shorter friend. Cindy’s parents disapproved of their friendship but grew tired of fighting it. They hoped it would run its course and die a natural death. As long as people tried to pry them apart their bond just got stronger. Julie was from a good family, very affluent in fact, but she had the reputation of being a bad girl. She smoked, drank, and had been picked up by the police for shop lifting. The only reason rode the bus was she destroyed her car driving while intoxicated. Only her father’s influence had made the charge go away but he refused to buy her another car until she could show some maturity.
“My paper is done. I had it finished last night.”
“What? How?”
The brunette smiled. “You know Randy Gunn?”
How him? She practically worshiped him from afar. Randy was her brother’s best friend and was a god on Earth. He and John had graduated last year.
“What about him?”
“He did my assignment for me. He reedited the one he turned in last year and gave it to me. It will be an easy ‘A’.”
Cindy tried to hide it but that made her mad. She had worked on this stupid English paper for weeks. It was a quarter of their grade, now Julie was beating the system again. She could have killed her.
“Why would he do that for you? Did you pay him? This is so unfair!”
“Hey, it wasn’t cheap. Don’t get so upset. See if you can get a car tonight and I’ll take you out. My treat.”
Julie’s family was better than well off but they gave her only a small allowance. It was enough for her to have ample spending money but not enough to get into too much trouble. “How do you have money? I thought you said the paper was expensive?”
She smiled again. “It was. I let him take a naked picture of me. He was so satisfied he even threw in 20 bucks.”
“Julie, I can’t believe you did that. You're only 16 who knows that he will do with that picture? C’mon that’s crazy.”
“I'm nearly 17, besides don’t sweat it. My face wasn’t in the shot, it wasn’t what he wanted to see anyway. Your only mad because he’s seen me naked and not you. Why don’t you tell him you like him? Better yet, let me take a bare-ass pic of you and give it to him. That’s a great way to break the ice.”
Cindy was silent for a moment. “No. I have more respect for myself than that. Thanks for the offer. Besides he's John's best friend. I've known him forever. It would be weird.”
She was surprised that she's almost considered it. Her friend was more liberated than herself, it was one of the things she liked about her. Cindy could live vicariously through the antics of her friend without risking pregnancy, STDs, humiliation, or jail time. She had promised her parents that she would not follow in Julie's footsteps.
"What's weird about it? If John ever wanted to have the Julie experience that would be the bomb. Would you object?"
She thought for a moment. She didn't want to tell her friend that she would want a better girl friend for her brother. So instead a polite lie had to do. "No, not at all. You go ahead and strip let me get my phone. I'll send the pic to him to him right away."
Before Julie had a chance to call her bluff the bus rolled around the corner and stopped in front of them.
Cindy followed her on but when she grabbed the hand rail it bent like putty in her hand, then it snapped free from the bus’ interior.
She exchanged worried looks with the driver. His eyes had bugged out of his head staring at her holding part of his bus. She smiled sheepishly as she handed the twisted chrome item to him. “Sorry.” Then took her seat.
The driver spent a moment trying to bend it back into shape. He was a big man and at full exertion it would not budge. He gave the 5 foot 3 inch blonde a concerned look before continuing his route.
They had been his last pickup before heading to school.

1113.content:
Cindy fell into her seat beside Julie.
“What was his problem?”
Cindy shrugged, “I guess its just cheap bus parts.”
Julie smiled at her friend. “I guess we should be glad that it runs well enough to get us to school.”
The bus rattled along it route until it came to a stop in front of their school. The students grabbed their gear and exited the bus.
The girls exchanged in small talk as they headed towards the building when an oversized hand grabbed Julie’s backpack from the rear.
“Hey, give that back!”
The thief was Lance Armstrong, up and coming jock and future sex offender. He was with his two greatest fans, David Harris and Doug Parkenson. The three of them were the scourge of the senior class.
“You can have it back at Duncan’s Reef tonight. There’s a party and you have the honor to be my date.”
Julie made several grabs for the bag but Lance whipped it away at the last second.
“I need that!” In fact she did, her prized pirated English paper was in there and she needed to hand it in.
The three goons laughed, tossing it back and forth between them.
“You can have it back tonight. Take it easy or you’ll have to be Dave and Doug’s date too!”
David smirked. “From what I’ve heard it wouldn’t be the first three-way she’s had.”
“You moron,” Doug called to his friend, “there’s three of us and her. That’s a foursome.”
Lance eyed Cindy. “If you come then it’s an orgy.”
She rolled her eyes. “Not if you were the last man on Earth. Give her the bag, the bell’s going to ring.”
Lance tossed Julie’s bag to one of his waiting goons and lunged to grab Cindy’s.
Things seemed to move in slow motion. Cindy saw him dive towards her and reflexively she reached out and grabbed him by his shirt. With a casual toss she sent him sailing into a stand of bushes nearly fifteen feet away. Then she sprinted and caught Julie’s bag in mid-air before it reached Doug.
The small crowd that had gathered to watch Julie’s torment now stood silent. No one could believe what they had just seen, including Cindy herself.
“Here’s your bag.” She handed it to Julie who numbly took it from her, it was only then that Cindy noticed that the stress of what she had just done shredded her pants from the knees down and her shoes had disintegrated. She stepped out of the ruined footwear and rushed to first period PE with a stunned Julie following behind.

121.content:
Jay Turner was a nice kid in school. He was happy, liked and always willing to help others. The only thing about him, though, that irritated his father to no end, was the fact that Jay was a little lazy sometimes. This meant that Jay was always... Slow.

During P.E. class at school, Jay almost always came in dead last when the kids had to run laps around the soccer field. It wasn't that Jay couldn't run faster, but that Jay was just too lazy to put in the extra effort.

When his dad needed Jay to get groceries out of the car, or to get the mail out of the mailbox, Jay always too a long time.

Now, Jay wasn't fat or overweight or anything. He was just slow and laid back. This would drive his father nuts!

Jay's dad, Harry, worked for a science lab. Harry had developed a secret serum that would speed up a person's legs and arm movements to amazing speeds, increasing rapidly over time. Harry had enough of Jay lagging behind all the time and he had decided that he was going to make his son the fastest kid on the planet!

"Jay! Come here for a sec..." Harry said, as he called Jay to come into his lab in the basement of the house.

The boy got up and slowly stammered his way down the stairs.

"Get a move on, son! Stop being so slow and so lazy!" Harry groaned. He was so tired of Jay being so slow.

"Sit down on the chair." Harry instructed his son, as he grabbed a syringe and filled it up with the serum.

"Wait! What are you doing, dad?"

"I'm gonna give you an injection, son! Your days of being slow are over!" Harry grinned, as he injected the serum into Jay's right shoulder.

After he pulled the needle out, Harry stuck and bandage on the boy's shoulder.

"There! Now, get up and go get the mail!"

Jay got up and started walking to the staircase. But, he started walking faster and faster!

He got to teh staircase so fast, it seemed like he was running!

"Whoa!" Jay grinned. "I'm moving a lot faster than before!"

Then he raced up the stairs and through the living room before he was out the door. Then he came back inside... With the mail, in under 10 seconds!

"There! That's much better!" Harry grinned.

"I... I'm like... fast! Really FAST!" Jay said out of amazement.

"Enjoy your super speed, son!" Harry smiled.

Jay just grinned, turned around, and raced to his room.

With every passing moment, it seemed like he was doing things faster and faster, including studying, writing out his homework, doing dishes, reading and typing on the computer! He had his homework done in under 5 minutes!

"Ohh man... I like THIS!" Jay grinned, as he wondered what to do next....

Rachael Blake has often lived a free life, being rebellious and enjoying her young adulthood. At times, she has often messed with other people by stealing from them or by messing with their heads. She is a mischievous one, always starting trouble when she feels the need to. Be it by making one person fight another, tricking people into giving her free stuff, and getting away with trouble through sheer luck or antics. Rachael's a trickster and she loves it. It fits her trickster personality of being the wild, tricky, and creative type.

This is the lifestyle Rachael chose after gaining the abilities to teleport herself wherever she wished. Back when she was 16, she was a nerd who wanted the attention of everyone at her school. At times, Rachael never got a chance to come to parties or trips because she was socially awkward, leading to her staying home because her friends, schoolmates, and sometimes her family didn't want her to be around. She was alone, feeling as though all this was her fault.

In order to make up for this, Rachael thought that maybe she could be better than that, perhaps she could become someone after doing something no one else has done. So she took to experimenting. When Rachael had free time, she would formulate plans that she wrote during science and engineering class about time and space in her notebook, deciding to see if she could maybe study something new about the world around her. Maybe that would get her recognition and become one of the popular girls at school.

Over time, while spending time in the garage, Rachael managed to build a gadget that looked like a watch. It was based on some online tech specs and her own knowledge, hoping to draw out a significant change in time. It was weird but worth trying out. She didn't have no knowledge on how to properly use it. Being a strange contraption, Rachael wanted to make sure that no one would see her work on it. So then Rachael stayed in the garage to test it at. Each night, she continued to test it out, hoping to get results from her hard work.

Unfortunately, something went awry during her third try in the garage at night. Strange energy started flowing from the watch, enveloping Rachael in electricity before causing a black out and knocking her out. Many people in the vicinity was in the dark that time. After a while, power came back and Rachael stayed asleep.

The next day, Rachael woke up, tired after falling unconscious. When she looked at the time, she realized that she was almost late for school. Shocked by this, she thought about getting her clothes and heading to school. Hopefully the teacher doesn't mark her up as late. She needs to get to school on time. Trying to think about getting her bag and clothes, she turns around and faces the door. One moment, she is in the garage, and the next she was in the living room holding her clothing and bag.

This was strange to her, feeling as though she discovered something new. Fortunately, nobody was around to see her do this. Wondering what just went on, Rachael tries again, hoping to get some food. Just like that, she appears in the kitchen, giving a shocked expression from it. She was by the fridge, wondering why she didn't get an apple and a soda immediately. Opening the fridge, she takes a can of soda and an orange. Closing the door, she heads over to the table. Maybe she should test out her powers more right now.

It took her a moment to realize that she was going to be late if she messes around. Realizing this, Rachael stands up and concentrates hard on getting to school. For a moment, she is teleported to the school bathroom, wondering how she got there. This was all too weird! Ever since that day, she decided that she would use her powers more and make the most of it. Heading out of the bathroom, she goes to class, smirking at her new-found potential.

Now that she has these powers and has gotten a bit older, Rachael thought about possibly doing more with them. So far, she has expanded her goals and how she would use them. She doesn't want to fit in to everyone's standards. Instead, she wants to do whatever she wants. At night, she would be a vigilante, causing her own mischief. By day, she would use it less often, hoping to prevent others from finding out about her powers. This would be fun for her, being a rebel who finally has something no one else does. With her abilities of teleportation, Rachael spent her years being creative and perfecting them the best she could.

What will she do?

15533122212211221122211221121.content:
"What's going on here?" You hear a guard yell from around the corner. You hear the guards' footsteps. You judge there to be four guards coming your way.

"Nothing. Just killed 3 inmates. One of them was insulted that I destroyed London. He instigated the fight. I just won," you say with a cocky grin on your face. You are excited to add four more to the kill count, making it 9,062,429 people. However, you want to have fun with these guys.

As the guards arrive, to the scene of your latest brawl, their expressions turn from anger to terror, as they see what looks like a 14 year old boy with 3 corpses near him. Of course, you are not 14, you're 15! Huge difference. Anyway, the guards look at you and ask, "Is this your doing?"

You reply, "Yes." You still have that grin on your face. Any mercy you once had is gone. I guess that is what happens when you become the most powerful human on the planet. However, these guards did not realize that you were that powerful.

"You are too dangerous to be around people. You will be sent to solitary confinement for 4 weeks," The head guard said. His terror seems to have dissipated.

"No, I don't think I'll be going to solitary. I don't want to." You slowly turn around and walk away.

"Rocco, go get him." You hear the head guard say. You turn around and see a large man about 50 yards away. You still show no sign of fright. But now you are having fun.

"Hands in the air, or I'll shoot!" Rocco yells. You just stand there, not putting your hands up. All you say is, "No, I don't feel like it." This guy is being brave, but not smart. If he was smart, he would turn around and run away screaming. "I MEAN IT!!!" He screams.

"No," you calmly respond. Now you are having fun. Then, a loud bang. People from all over your cell block come to watch, from a safe distance away. Now, for what Rocco lacks in brains, he makes up for in aim. The bullet hits you right between the eyes. A normal person would die immediately, but you are the most powerful person alive. You are unfazed by the bullet. Since that run in with the gun toting telekine in London, you developed a resistance to pain. That bullet merely tickled your face. By the time the bullet hit the floor, you were face to face with Rocco. "Now I'm angry," you lie. You're having fun messing with him. Rocco now is paralyzed from fear. As you ponder how to kill him, you feel another tingle. Another bullet. You make a small ball of your trademark light-blue fire, and send it at the guard that shot you. It goes right through him, creating a hole in his chest. Now the other guards are terrified. They try to run, but you make a force field, trapping them in there with you. You decide the most fun way to kill Rocco. You step back, and rearrange every atom in his body. You turn him into two balls of pure unstable hydrogen. "Goodbye," you sneer at the two other guards. Then you laugh as you fuse the two balls together, creating a 150 megaton explosion confined inside of your force field. Then, as you absorb all of the leftover matter, you dispel the force field, emerging from it unscathed. Even though that blast created a fireball that was 10,000,000 Kelvin, you're fine. You love being invincible and immortal. "Does anyone else want to fight me?" You yell. There was silence in the room. "That's what I thought." You laugh evilly as you phase through the wall of the maximum security prison.

As you fly away, you notice a military helicopter following you. Seeing how you'd rather be alone, you create another blue fireball, and destroy the helicopter. Now the military knows your power, so you hope to have a quiet journey back home to your lair in the City of Power. You just served 40 minutes of a 40 year sentence at prison. You laugh maniacally as you fly home. However, something interrupts your flight. What is it?

Option 1: Someone else with the Deity Force. He wants to train you, because there is more to it that you have not learned. You will stay evil, just gain more power.

Option 2: You want to destroy a whole country, so you fly to Iran, because it was the first country you could think of with beliefs you disagree with.

"Stop John!" you hear as you fly over Edinburgh. "I want to talk to you." Seeing how they seem to pose no threat, you stop and turn around. Immediately, you see a tall, muscular 16 year old boy. "My name is Leo, but you can call me The Fierce Deity. (I like Zelda). You may think I'm 16, but I'm actually 26, and I want to train you." You seem confused. Why is this guy asking to train you. You think to yourself, I'm the most powerful person alive. "Actually, you are wrong," he says bluntly. "Just like you, I'm in control of the Deity Force."

"If you are, prove it," you challenge. Immediately, a ball of blood red fire appears, then it turns into a ball of iron, then gold, then diamond, then cesium, then hydrogen. After a few more changes, Leo absorbs the ball back into himself.

"Unlike you, I've been honing my power for ten years, and I've unlocked even more of it. The Deity Force is not only manipulation of matter down to a Planck level, it is so much more," he says as he performs yet another stunt using his power. He shoots lasers from his eyes. He's already shown himself being a telepath, which is something you are not, yet, but also a laser eye user.

"When do we start?" you ask eagerly.

"Follow me to my domain." He just starts flying straight up. You follow him until you see a giant palace in the sky. He lets you in, and shows you to a giant empty room. "This is my practice room. I use it to hone my skills, and discover new ones. Anyway, I sense that you will be capable of far more than any other in existence, and I want to help you unlock your potential. I only ask for this in return."

"What?" At this point, you'll give him almost anything in return.

"Just to be your personal advisor/bodyguard in the N.O.S.H, and to be a trainer for people who want to hone their powers." He replies.

"I WOULD LOVE THAT!" You yell. Not only is this guy really nice, powerful, and humble, all he wants to do is serve you. Score, you think to yourself.

"Okay, let the training commence. First, I have a full list of powers that I've acquired over my years of being The Fierce Deity." He takes out a piece of paper, and starts reading. "This will take a minute." Just from that, you get excited. "Super strength, supersonic flying/running, laser/heat vision, freeze vision, metalkinesis, pyrokinesis, biomancy, manipulation of matter, creation/destruction of matter, creation of new elements, invulnerability to physical attacks such as gunshots stabbing and punches, immortality, necromancy, and telepathy. However, I would suggest not making an army of the dead, or using necromancy at all. Most of the time, you just get skeletons that crumble immediately due to their lack of muscle. Plus, it is scary. Anyway, did you get all that?"

"Yes. Out of those, I've been able to..." You list all of the powers you've mastered.

"So, you have a decent amount of learning left. Anyway, lets start by finding your limits." Leo then makes a bazooka, points it at you, and fires. You shrug the explosion off like it was nothing. "Okay, durability, high." You then realize that you haven't had your super suit on in a while. You conjure up your costume made of your own personal indestructible metal, and put it on. The suit is black with light blue streaks, the same color as your demon fire. "Oh, I forgot about my suit." Leo puts his on too. It is black, but with red streaks, the same color as the fireball that he made. "I love this suit. I made it so that it would be indestructible, and it would augment my power further." You can see pure power emanating off of his body.

"Why did I not think to do that?" You ask yourself. You modify your suit to augment your power 100 fold whenever you have it on. After that, a blue aura of power surrounds your body. "Let's start this training montage!" You say.

"Okay, first, considering that you are a super villain, you should look a bit more intimidating. I'd say that you should make yourself appear stronger than a normal 14 year old boy." You agree with him, and you use your biomancy to buff yourself up a little. You see your pecs emerge from your chest, an 8 pack form under them. After a minute, you looked like a junior bodybuilder. "Can I learn some powers now?" You ask impatiently.

"Hang on, I'm calculating your limits, that way I don't strain you. Even the Deity Force has limits. How fast can you fly?"

"Mach 100, but now, because of my suit, I guess Mach 10,000." You reply.

"Okay, let's start. What do you want to learn first?" He asks.

"Telepathy. That seems like it would be quick." You reply.

"Okay, what am I thinking right now." Peter piper picked a peck of pickled peppers.

"Peter piper picked a peck of pickled peppers." You respond.

"That didn't take long."

"Okay, now how about super strength. I've never checked to see if I had that."

"Okay, here, try to lift this." Leo then creates a large weight. "It weighs 10,000 tons." You walk over to it, put your hands under it, and pick it up. It was like a feather. "Okay, I was not expecting that to be an issue. I found that one almost immediately. Let's try something a bit more complicated, laser vision." He holds a piece of paper in front of him and looks at it. "Watch closely." He narrows his eyes. As they close, you see a red glow form in his pupils. Then, a red laser shoots out of his eyes, igniting the paper. "Now, the secret to a good precise laser is focus. Focus on what you want to shoot. The more you focus, the more likely you are to hit the target." You look at a target about 50 yards away. You narrow your eyes, and shoot a beam of blue at the target. It is a perfect bullseye. "Well, I've never seen a blue laser before. I guess you really like the color blue."

"Yeah, it has always been my favorite. Anyway, I've had a question for a while. Whenever I make fire, it is blue. People call it demon fire. What do you call your red fire?"

"Hell fire, anyway, freeze vision is the same as laser vision, you just focus on freezing the object rather than setting it ablaze. You can also change how powerful the laser is. The more powerful, the more taxing it is on your energy."

"Thank you. Anyway, is there anything else I need to learn?" You ask.

"Only 2 more things. Creation and destruction of matter. This is the most difficult. You have absorbed quite a lot of matter since you discovered your power. You've had to use that or other matter around to create things. With this power, you will be able to create something out of nothing. Ready?"

"Ready." You reply.

"Okay, lets begin. I can see if you use existing matter to create stuff, so this will be the ultimate test. First, try to create a ball of pure carbon, without using any of the matter in this room." You focus on carbon. Since you can manipulate matter, you've memorized every characteristic of every element, compound, ion and isotope. You focus on making a ball. Slowly, you see matter appearing before your eyes. Matter that was not there before. You shape that matter into a ball, and manipulate each atom to be carbon-12.

"I did it!" You exclaim happily. "Now I need to destroy this?"

"Yes."

"Hear goes nothing." You look at the little ball you made, and focus on making it go away. After a minute, you see the matter fade out of existence. "Yes, I did it!"

"Okay, to complete your training, I would like you to stay in here and strengthen your powers for a couple of hours. Then, we will see if you are ready to leave."

"Will do." You make a chair in the middle of the room, creating all the matter in it, and sit. First, you practice your super strength. You create a block of iron weighing 1,000,000 tons. You lift it no problem. Then, you add more iron to it, making it 1,000,000,000 tons. Finally, you've found your limit, as you struggle to lift the block. Then, you focus on flight. You set up a radar gun to pick up how fast you fly. Your goal is to be able to fly .1c, or 10% the speed of light. Seeing how your radar gun picks up your speed in m/s, calculating your speed in "Machs" should be easy. You raise up off of the ground, and start flying around in circles. After flying for 30 minutes, you feel your acceleration decreasing. Once you feel your acceleration stop, you start to slow down.

After you stop, you look at the gun. It says that you reached 35,000,000 m/s. You calculate that to be approximately 12% of the speed of light, or mach 102,941. You are happy. Then, you focus on your vision. You stare at the target from nearly one kilometer away. You fire a blue beam. Then, you rush over to the target. Another bullseye.

You continue this kind of training more more than 3 hours, before Leo walks in. "Okay, lets see your progress." You show him your new powered up powers. He is impressed. It took him years to master half of the powers you mastered in one day. "You're ready to go." You and him leave the sky palace, and head to your City of Power. With your new speed increase, you and him get there in 4 seconds, despite it being almost 3,000 km away. You enter your lair, and see Julian where you placed him 2 days before.

"Wow, I guess 40 years means nothing when you can get out that easily."

"Yeah," you respond laughing. You then tell him what happened since you last saw your brother, introducing him to Leo. "Leo is going to be our personal advisor and bodyguard. He also is in touch with the Deity Force, so he trained me to use my powers even better." You turn to Leo. "Leo, my brother is the most powerful pyrokine I know. Could you train him to make him even better?" You ask him.

"Of course." He responds. Somehow, your nearly perfect life gets better.
155331222122112211222112211211.title: Powering Up

choices: The UN lied about their deal, and start super-discrimination almost immediately.
19 months, 18 days, 3 hours, 34 minutes and 12 seconds later, the plan begins.
1553312221221122112221122112112.content:
"Julian, follow Leo. He's going to make you even stronger," you say to your brother, motioning him to follow the 16 year old. Once Julian leaves, you broadcast yourself on all of the TVs in the city, saying that you have made your triumphant return from prison. Immediately after you say this, you hear muffled cheering from the whole population of your super city. You also let the public know about the war, and how your military was winning. Another cheer was heard. You feel that pretty soon the war will be won. You shut off the broadcast, and wait for Leo and Julian to finish. You have business, and you need them.

2 hours later...

You see your brother and bodyguard emerge from one of the many power practice rooms in your lair. "Bro, guess what!" Julian shouts at you.

"What?" You inquire.

"Leo is a very good trainer. So good in fact, that he helped me discover a new power! Follow me." He said. You follow him to the practice room they used before. The large empty room was littered with targets, weights, random objects, and any other thing a super could use to practice. "While I was making one of my fireballs, which are now green, I.."

"Green?" You cut him off.

"Yes." Julian says. He makes a bright green fireball, and lobs it at one of the targets, setting it ablaze. "I call it Wildfire. Anyway, It seems this pyrokine can fly, and has super strength." You are dumbfounded, but proud. Julian flies over to one of the many large weights scattered around the room. It reads, 100,000 tons. Julian lands next to it, puts one hand under it, and lifts it over his head. "Catch!" He yelled. Pretty soon, you were playing catch with the weight.

"Anyway, that was fun, but I have important business to tend to. I'm taking Leo with me to Brussels to negotiate a surrender." You say, putting down the weight.

"Why would we be surrendering?" Julian asks.

"Not us, them." You reply.

"That makes sense. I assume that you'll put me in charge until you get back."

"Of course. You are my second in command after all."

"Thanks. Anyway, see you when I see you!" It was Julian's trademark farewell. You leave the practice room, with Julian left in it practicing his new found flying capabilities. You tell Leo of your plan, and you set off for Brussels with him.

Seeing how you can fly at more than 10% of the speed of light, the journey did not take long. You might as well have teleported. You enter the UN building, telling the receptionist that you would like to meet with the same people you met with a few days prior. She obliged, seeing how you were in your suit, radiating power. She did not want to cross you.

You are shown up to the same large room filled with tables. At every table, there was a representative of a country. The U.K, the U.S, Israel, Canada, Japan, etc. They were all there. "So, the Fallen God comes before us again." One of them says. You recognize this man as the representative for the United States. He's also the person who sentenced you to prison.

"Hello again. I'm here to negotiate your surrender. My troops have won every battle they've fought in this war. We are stronger and smarter than you. If you surrender now, we will stop fighting. All that we want is to make peace, and coexist with you peacefully. And about London... Personally, my destroying of London was to make sure my troops were safe. I mean, it's like the end of WWII, just much more destructive." The American was furious about that remark. "Anyway, I promise that no more cities will be wiped off the face of the Earth if you surrender. Unless of course, they start making anti-super laws, like London. Then it will go poof. We stop fighting, we coexist, and we supers will not be persecuted. No more anti-super laws. Capisce?"

"Give us a moment." One of the reps said. You exit the room and wait to hear about their decision. If they were smart, they would surrender. However, these were the guys who sent you to prison. And that plan worked perfectly. You laugh as you realize that nobody is stopping you from setting the room ablaze if they say no.

After 30 minutes, someone exited the room, and told you to enter. "We have made up our minds." Said the American. "If you promise that there will be no more bloodshed, and that you will exit here with only peaceful intentions, we will surrender."

"Just remember my terms, outlaw anti-super laws, and the bloodshed will stop." You remind the reps.

"Unfortunately, we need to have some to protect the general public." A Chinese rep remarked.

"Well, we seem to have reached an impasse. I refuse to stop unless you refuse the laws, and you say that you need the laws. I guess the war will continue." You smugly retort. "Good day ladies and gentlemen." And with that you start to leave.

"WAIT!" You hear. You turn around, and see that they are not done with you.

"What do you want?" You sneer. You have an army to command.

"It seems that you've escaped from our most secure prison within hours of arriving. This proves that we cannot stop you from doing anything."

"Yes, I know that. Besides, it was minutes, not hours. However, in those minutes, I did kill 7 more people. It was self-defense though." Your taunting the UN now. Even though you are the leader of the supers, you're still a 15 year old kid, inside.

"Ignoring that, we still want to surrender."

"Too bad. You refused to meet with my demands."

"We're willing to make a deal." Now you're interested.

"What is this deal?" You ask?

"The laws we want to make are not prejudice laws. No discrimination, no segregation. They're just laws like, 'No using powers to take advantage of those who don't have them.' and 'No using powers to get away with crimes.' People with and without powers will go to the same schools, live in the same city if they choose to, get the same jobs, or even get jobs that their powers will help them with. We will make sure that lawmakers will not make laws that limit the rights of supers." That is a good deal... But how will you continue being your evil self? You ponder this thought until an you have an epiphany. Now that you think about it, why should there be normal, non supers? You decide that this will be your next goal, but you will save it for a good time. Now, you want to make amends.

"After thinking about it, I have made my decision. I will agree to that deal. We stop fighting, you stop persecuting. Deal?"

"Deal!" The whole room, besides you and Leo, responds in unison. You sign the forms agreeing to the terms, and leave.

You arrive back in your lair, where Julian is sitting. "How did the meeting go?"

"Just as I wanted. The UN surrendered, and all of the super-prejudice laws will be revoked and outlawed. We will coexist peacefully, until I say so." You start to laugh evilly. Then, you walk over to Julian. "Do you really want to live a normal life again, knowing full well that the peace can only last so long?" Julian looks puzzled. "Personally, I feel that, if this new way of life doesn't work, and more super-prejudice laws appear, we wipe out any non supers." Julian starts to grin.

"When do we start?" He asks.

"I think the best time is in a year or two. We see how life is going, and if it is returning to the state it was in when we ran away, then we put the plan in motion. Otherwise, start being normal super villains. Threatening landmarks, crowded places, etc. Then, lawmakers will reinforce the anti-super laws, and boom! Start the plan." After debriefing Julian, you hug it out. Then, you broadcast your success at the UN, and tell all of the citizens of your city that the rest of the world is safe for supers. For now. Then, you tell them of your plan. The response was overwhelmingly positive. They were fed up with the prejudice. This will be perfect revenge. You finish your broadcast, and stay in your lair. You, Julian, Leo, and everyone else who wants to stay in the city will spend from now until when the plan starts honing your powers and strengthening. The UN won't know what hit them.

Meanwhile, in Brussels.

"I'm a little suspicious about that kid. He seems a bit twisted. I think our hidden loophole in the papers will do the trick..."
1553312221221122112221122112112.title: Back to the UN

choices: Back in the City of Power, you're greeted with a hero's welcome.
15533122212211221122211221121121.content:
Warning, strong language and violence is used in this chapter. If you are uncomfortable with any choices that I make in this, I am sorry. This does not reflect any opinions I have. If you are not comfortable with that, then how did you make it this far on the Internet. Anyway, enjoy!
P.S. I am not a psychopath, and I have no idea where these ideas came from. I'm a bit disturbed myself.

"My Lord, you may want to see this." Leo says to you. You walk up to a monitor set up in your lair, and notice some troubling news.

"The UN has made a statement denouncing the Nation of Super Humans, otherwise known as N.O.S.H, for breaking the rules of war, and will not be upholding the terms of their surrender. Starting tomorrow, all people registered as 'Super' will be relocated to areas currently unknown. Sarah Storm, City of Power News, Channel 4." Sarah Storm, the news anchor for the city's news channel stated.

"Thank you Sarah," Pierre Clemont, a french super said. He's the other anchor. "In other news, scientists here in the city have been able to breed fire proof cats. For all you pyrokines scared of owning animals, now's your chance! Located in the shopping district, Xavier's Pet Shop is..."

You set the monitor ablaze in a marvelous shade of blue. "It's been one week. ONE WEEK! THEY ARE GOING TO PAY!!" You scream. "Leo, find all the supers you can and bring them back to the City. This is the only safe haven for them. Especially after what I'm about to do." With that eerie remark, you disappear.

"I guess I'll fix the monitor first." Leo muttered. He makes a new monitor, and leaves.

-----------------------------------------

While Leo is retrieving supers, you head back to Brussels. As you approach the UN office, you notice that it's completely abandoned. They moved, and without a trace of where. This gets you even more angry. "Okay UN, you want to play hard to explode? Fine. However, I will find you, and I will destroy you." You laugh maniacally. You're officially a psychopath, but you don't care. As your laughter subsides, blue fire dances on your fingertips. "You know what Brussels, you're OK for now. I think I'll go somewhere else." You fly off, fire still erupting from your fingers. Eventually, you settle on something to annihilate. You change flying directions to straight up. Soon, you're in space. "I don't feel like killing right now. Just exploding." You say as you head off. While you want to destroy something important to the non-supers, you also don't want to damage any astronomical tools or findings. You've always enjoyed astronomy. Soon, you settle on a random asteroid. "Hello Mr. Asteroid, I'm The Fallen God, and you're history. Since you're in space, there's no oxygen to fuel your fire. Rather than create some, you take the more direct approach. As the asteroid comes hurdling towards you, you set up for a punch.

One minute ago, a 600km wide asteroid existed. Now, all that's left is dust. You obliterated the asteroid with a single punch. I guess when I'm angry, I get more powerful. That or my powers are even stronger than before. Anyway, that was fun. You think to yourself. As you float in the newly empty space an asteroid used to call home, you realize something. If the UN moved out of Brussels, they probably are at one of their other offices. With that thought, you immediately head off to New York City.

Within minutes, you reach a large street in the middle of Manhattan. On each sidewalk, a line of flagpoles with flags of many different countries is visible. "I think I've found what I was looking for." You laugh as you walk into the building.

"Welcome to the United Nations. How may I be of service?" The receptionist said as if it was rehearsed. You can sense her absolute terror.

"Yeah, I need to speak with the leaders of all the nations. It's urgent, and they know what's coming." You sneer.

"I'm s-s-sorry, but I'm af-f-fraid I c-cannot grant that request." She stutters. She is terrified.

"It's okay. I will not hurt you if you cooperate. Now, where is their main meeting room. I have urgent business." You tell her.

"27th floor. You can't miss it." She screams.

"Thank you. Your cooperation will be rewarded. You might want to leave this building. Things may get explody" You say. She immediately runs out of the building, and to the sidewalk, where she gets a cab and drives off. "I think she will go far. She knows what's important in life. Surviving." You laugh as you head over to the elevator.

"27th floor." A voice in the elevator says. You walk out and are greeted with a hallway. You walk down the hallway and notice a large set of double doors. With your immense strength, you destroy the doors, revealing the same representatives as in Brussels. "I thought we had a deal. Well, you broke it. Prepare to meet the wrath of a God." Similar to how you destroyed London, you begin making a small compact star.

"WAIT!" A voice yells. "You agreed to this! It's right here in the treaty!" You look and notice the German representative holding the treaty with your signature on it.

"I agreed to no persecution, not forced eviction. So give me one reason why I should vaporize this whole room!" You yell.

"This treaty states that the relocation is not considered persecution!" The German responds.

"Bullshit! If it truly says that, than that treaty is called off!" You yell as your eyes start to glow blue. You then turn the treaty into ash with your laser vision. "Anyone else have anything they want to say before you become a gas?"

"Please don't kill us! We have friends, families! People need us to live!" Representatives yell, all terrified.

"Fine, I won't kill all of you. Only the ones who denounced the N.O.S.H before. If you did not denounce my nation, please raise your hands over your head and leave the room. And I will know if you lie." About a third of the room got up and left. However, you notice something wrong. "You must be the representative of Belarus. Remember what I said about lying? Well, I know that you denounced the N.O.S.H. However, you may be wondering how I know? I have these things called powers. I am telepathic, and I can read your thoughts. However, unlike many, I can read past thoughts. I know what you did, and because of this, you get to watch my remodeling of this room before I kill you. Are you ready." Your psychopathy acts up. "I'm really not sorry. After what you said about my nation designed to protect supers against prejudice, I've lost all empathy for you non-supers, and even supers who sympathize with you. You may think I'm leading a 4th Reich, but I'm not. I'm simply trying to do what's best for my nation. You brought this upon yourselves. Anyway, where was I before Germany so rudely interrupted me?"

"You were creating a ball of gas." The Russian representative answered.

"Very good! For that, you get a gold star!" You laugh as you lob a small gold fireball at him, setting him ablaze, killing him. After that, many of the representatives tried to escape through the busted doors or the fire escape, but noticed they could not. "Don't even bother trying to get away, your trapped in here with me. Force fields are fun!"

"You're a monster!" One representative yelled.

"I prefer the terms psychopath and God." You say. Rather than setting that one on fire, you redesign his molecular structure, turning him into a stone statue of himself. Then, you punch it, turning it into dust. "Who's next? Eeny, meeny, miny, you!" You point at a woman cowering on her knees.

"Please don't kill me. I only said what I said because other reps forced me to." She cowers. You use your telepathy to see if she lied.

"I'm sorry, but your story does not add up. Sorry not sorry." You grin as you turn her into a ball of gas. "While killing you individually is fun, it's taking too long. (And it won't fit into the character limit). You have two options. You can either be vaporized by this gas ball which will soon be a small star, or you can be crushed by gravity. Those who choose the vaporization, go to my left. Those who choose crushing, go to my right." The room splits, and you begin. You start with the left group. You make a small force field around this group. "Goodbye. You will be missed, but not by me." You take the gas ball which was once a living person, and compact it into a small glowing star. You then make it collapse, causing a brilliant explosion compacted into the tight space of the force field. "I just realized something. This is exactly how I killed those guards in that prison. Funny how things repeat. Anyway, next group!" You enter the force field containing the terrified politicians. "I've never tried manipulating gravity before. If this doesn't work, I have a back up." You concentrate on making an extremely dense object in the force field. Soon, you notice the people being forced towards it. You just keep adding matter to it. Soon, it becomes a small black hole, and all the people in the force field get sucked in. After everyone disappeared, you dismiss the fields and remove all the matter from the black hole and former star.

In the corner, you notice the one representative you spared cowering. "What are you going to do to me."

"I think I have just the plan. In physics, there are laws stating that matter cannot be created or destroyed. Allow me to show you that that's not true. I'm not killing you, I'm erasing you. Goodbye." As you finish, you lift him in the air, and slowly begin removing the matter from his body. After one minute, his existence became a thing of the past. "This is what happens when you double cross a God!" You yell into the air, as you lift yourself up in the air and fly back to the City of Power.
15533122212211221122211221121121.title: Massacre in the UN

155331222122112211222112211211211.content:
Warning. This character is still a psychopath, and I am terrified with what I created. Also, the beginning of this is just an explanation of how society will work for the supers. Enjoy

While you fly back to the City of Power, you realize something. There are a lot of people there. Soon you'll run out of room for the newest immigrants. So you begin to think about solutions. Finally, you come up with one. You alter course and head towards the North Atlantic Ocean. As soon as you make it to your desired location, you create a large island the size of France. You then create it's landscape, adding mountains, valleys, rivers, lakes, etc. You then create towns, farms, buildings, cities, resorts and infrastructure. Finally, you create its climate, making it have a diverse climate so it can have everything from skiing to swimming. With your remaining power, you teleport the population of the City of Power to this new country with all their belongings. "Hello my subjects!" You announce to the public. Everyone cheers and screams like you're their lord and savior. Then again, you are. "You may wonder why you are here. Well, with the City of Power's population reaching 25,000,000, and it continuing to grow, I felt that we needed more room. So, I created this country. It has the name Supernia. There are 14 provinces in Supernia. You can read all about them in your pamphlets. You may choose one to live in. However, there is limited space in all of them. There are 14 teleporters on the ground corresponding to each province. Each province will play a part in the country's society, whether it is food production, tourism, education, etc.. Each province has recommended powers. For example, people who manipulate earth would be much better in Greensboro, the farming province, than Regina, the capital region. Those people will have top priority when deciding who gets to go to which province. The only exception is the education province, Educanta, which houses all the colleges in the country. This one needs the top users of powers. Next, government. I will rule over the country as a whole, but each province will have its own government. When you arrive at your province, you will be able to democratically choose members of the province's government, as well as representatives of your province for the overall government. Each province, regardless of population has 7 delegates for the overall government, as well as 1 for every 500,000 people living in each province..." (There is more, but I don't feel like writing it. If you have any questions about how life will work on Supernia, then let me know via e-mail.) "Anyway, with that out of the way, choose where to live!" You finish as you fly to the capital city, Regina City. Soon, the population of Supernia disperses around the landmass in a favorable way. "Perfect. Now, to rule."

You predicted that Regina would be the most populated province, and you were right. Using your supreme intellect, you calculated that about 15% of the population would flock to Regina, and you were right. The population of Regina was 3,600,000, with 2,000,000 living directly in the city. You, Julian and Leo live in the heart of the City, in the Palace of Power. While creating the country, you made sure everyone could live a comfortable life, no matter the monetary situation. Every house also has a practice room, made so that any power can be used in it without affecting anything outside of it. Your tax law is actually one that doesn't crap on the poor and benefit the obscenely rich. There are jobs for everyone, and the country is entirely self sufficient. You were worried about people being drawn to the touristy areas, and being uninterested in the more labor intensive provinces. However, everything worked out perfectly. You took a census, and found that each province had a perfect amount of people in it. Happy, you go to your bedroom to lay down and sleep. Creating an entire country out of thin air took a lot out of you, despite your immeasurable power.

When you woke up, you noticed that your programs were already working. Every person kept their old jobs from the City of Power, so society was able to function immediately. Again, exactly as you planned. "Wake up sleepyhead!" Julian yells at you. It scares you and makes you punch in the direction of Julian. Thankfully, Julian reacted in time, because one punch from you can destroy a mountain. "Watch where your punching, I might be powerful, but not quite 'You' powerful!"

"Sorry, natural reaction. Anyway, what's going on?" You respond.

"Well, everyone is responding to the new country very well. I also adopted one of those fire-proof cats from Xavier's pet shop. They're not kidding about their fire resistance either. Even I couldn't burn it!" Julian laughed.

"Julian, how long was I out?" You ask in a concerned manner.

"About 3 days. I didn't want to disturb you, but when I heard you get up, I darted in here. Thanks for creating this place. However, I think you overdid it." Julian replied.

"What do you mean?" You inquire.

"Well, you were out for three days! You are more powerful than anything, and yet you were in a three day coma!" He yelled.

"I see what you mean. However, look at the result!" You respond happily. "Plus, a lot of times, when supers strain themselves, they get stronger out of it." You say. All of the sudden, a ball of light appears in you hand. "Thanks to that, I've unlocked energy manipulation. I've been waiting for that one. I'll be in the practice room."

When you get to the practice room, you create a target to blast. You aim your finger at it, and shoot a laser out of it. It hits the target and produces a large explosion. You determine the strength of it as 50 megatons. "Wow, that took like, no effort. I really did get stronger. I didn't even know I could get stronger!" You laugh maniacally as you exit the practice room. Once the door closes, the room resets, a standard feature. "Julian, I'm going into space to destroy things. I'll be back in a jiffy." You walk onto the balcony of the presidential palace, take a look at the beautiful Regina City, and fly straight up.

You reach an undiscovered, uninhabited planet about the size of Earth. You land on it, the cold of space and poisonous atmosphere not affecting you at all. Okay, Let's see if I can destroy this planet. First, you make an energy ball, and shoot it at the planet. It blows up immediately. Energy ball destroys, what about a punch? You rebuild the planet. Because you don't have to put the detail of Supernia into this one, it doesn't drain as much energy. You land on the planet and punch it as hard as you can. However, you only create a large crater. Granted it's the size of a city, but it's still not total destruction. This disappoints you. You decide to try your favorite power than causes explosions. Laser vision. You look directly down, and shoot. The blue laser digs through the ground like it's paper, and hits the core. The core collapses and the planet implodes on itself. I was not expecting that, but it works. Succeeding in planet destruction, you fly back to Earth, but not before running into another planet in your path. Rather than move out of the way, you just aim your finger at it and destroy it. It didn't have life on it, and you knew nobody knew about it on Earth. Plus, you didn't care what people on Earth thought of you planet-destroying. You did have standards for planets though. You would never destroy a planet known by astronomers. Astronomers are some of the only non-supers you currently respect. Anyway, the planet explodes because of the energy blast you hit the planet with, and you continue on your way home.

You return home, noticing that all the provinces were done choosing their governments. You study all of them, and approve each one. The group that runs the whole nation, otherwise known as the Council of Supernia, consists of all the provincial representatives, yourself (President), Julian(Vice President), and the leaders of each division of the government. (I'm basing the Council of Supernia off of the US government, minus the parties and corruption.) "John!" Julian yells.

"What?" You calmly respond.

"There's a Council meeting starting in 10 minutes. Every single member of the new government will be there, including provincial leaders. You need to be there." Julian answers. "See you there."

"See ya." You go to your bathroom, shower, put on a nice suit, and head to the meeting.
155331222122112211222112211211211.title: Goodbye City of Power.  Hello Country of Supernia.
