"I'll get it." You replied, walking over to the fridge. When you opened it, you noticed that you were out of orange juice. "Okay, who's going to the store to get more OJ?"

"I'll do it!" Eddie answered without hesitation. "I have to get more ingredients anyway."

"Thank's Eddie." You smiled, grabbing the milk instead. You sat down, poured yourself and Julian a glass, and started eating your breakfast. "Eddie, you are such a good cook! I just don't get it!"

"Well, it's pretty hard to screw up pancakes." Eddie laughed. "It's all just practice."

"You have to teach me how to cook at some point!" You smiled, hoping to get lessons from him.

"Of course! Anything for you My Lord!" Eddie smiled. "Anyway, I have some dishes to clean. I know you have a busy day, so I don't want to keep you occupied."

"Thanks Eddie!" Julian added, stuffing pancakes into his mouth.

After you finished you breakfast, you started to head outside. Everyone in the palace knew that you and Julian would be out for the day, so you didn't need to worry about anything until you arrived. "Okay, remember the plan? Blend in until we find them." You reminded Julian.

"Yep. Let's go." Julian nodded, lifting himself into the air. Even though you and Julian could complete the 2,000 mile journey in less than a second, you decided to take it relatively slow. Sometimes a leisurely fly is what you need in the morning.

After about half an hour, you landed in a small field outside of Edinburgh, making sure not to be noticed. After landing, you jogged to Edinburgh, making sure not to use any powers along the way. Eventually, you made it to the Royal Mile, which was exactly as you remembered it from family trips there. You decided to walk along, looking for a place to get lunch in the near future. Besides, if anything was going to happen in Edinburgh, it would happen here. After some walking, you came across an anti-super rally. You and Julian (nobody outside of Supernia would recognize you guys without your costumes) walked over to one of the protesters, and asked what was going on.

"We've had it with these super people!" The protester yelled. "They might have powers, but they can't rule the world! We all need to live too."

"Besides, one crazy one destroyed London!" Another protester yelled to you. "Why would someone do that! There were so many people."

"It's terrible, isn't it?" You replied, trying to blend in. "Anyway, I'm trying to find someone. Thank you for the info!"

"You're welcome." The protester replied. You continued through the crowd, trying to find your parents. After 5 minutes of searching, you found nothing. Feeling a little down, you decided to sit outside at a small restaurant. Across from you were two very familiar people.

"Julian. I see them." You whispered. "Turn around." He turned around, and saw who you were referring to.

"Yep. That's them all right." Julian smiled. "We should go up to them."

"Let's do this." You agreed, getting up from your seat. "Hello, you two look extremely familiar. Do I know you?" You asked them.

"John? Julian? Is that really you?" The woman replied.

"Hi Mom, hi Dad. We've missed you." Julian started crying. "Ever since the explosion in London, we've been looking for you."

"Cut the crap Julian." You dad replied harshly. "Listen, meet us at this address in one hour, we'll talk there. I know why you're here." You were shocked as you were handed a sheet of paper.

"Okay." You replied. "We'll be there."


One hour later.

You arrived at the address. It was just another house in Edinburgh. Nothing fancy. You knocked on the door, and waited. After one minute, your mother answered the door. "Did anyone follow you here?" She asked cautiously.

"No." you and Julian replied simultaneously.

"Good. Come inside and follow me." You mother started into the house and headed for the basement. It was a very empty room. However, your mother kept going in. At one point, she stopped at a wall and raised her hand. Immediately, the wall disappeared, revealing a secret room. "Leo found us when he came here on vacation. Unfortunately, he caught us trying to 'blend in'. We've been hiding here since you blew up The Gherkin. We've changed all of our personal information, and hid the fact that we had powers from everyone. Even you." She explained. "This room is impenetrable and undetectable to anyone who does not have powers. Follow me." She started into the room, you and Julian following. After you made it completely in, she closed up the room. The room was not large, but had a lot of stuff in it. It was almost like a nuclear bunker. In the middle was your dad sitting in a chair.

"Let me explain." He started. "We moved here after all of your London incidents. However, people here were starting to feel uneasy about the super situation. We couldn't come out and say that we were the parents of the person committing 'terrorism' in London. Once David Cameron announced the existence of supers officially, the country went into a panic, and wanted to come after everyone with powers. Us included. Thankfully, our powers helped us. I can alter memories, and you mother is a master illusionist. With this combination, we were able to convince everyone around us that we were not supers. Unfortunately, we had to blend in, hence the anti-super rallies we've been participating. In reality, we've been slowly saving up to get out."

"Well, now's your chance!" You smiled.

"What do you mean?" Your mother asked.

"Your sons just so happen to be the most powerful people on the planet!" Julian laughed. "We can take you to Supernia! John's the president!"

"Really?" Your father replied, tears forming. "You don't understand how worried we've been for you guys."

"You really shouldn't worry." You smiled. "As I said, I'm the most powerful super out there. There's nothing that can be done to combat me! Not even Julian has a chance of beating me!"

"Hey, we're going to settle this later." Julian chuckled. "Now is not the time."

"So John, I heard a lot of stories about you." Your mother started. "Are they true?"

"Depends on the stories. I feel like The Fallen God has gathered quite a reputation." You chuckled.

"Well, how you single-handedly destroyed London, and killed a majority of the UN." She said.

"Yeah... I might have gone a bit overboard on those." You smiled awkwardly.

"It's fine." Your father replied. "It was for the good of super lives. Now, let's get out of here."

"People are starting to get suspicious of us." Your mother started. "I'm not sure why, but I think that they might be catching onto our ruse."

"Okay, let's go." You said, exiting the room with Julian and your parents. You made it to the front door, where a policeman was standing.
1553312221221122112221122112112111111111.title: The Ruse

1553312221221122112221122112112111111111.content:
Violence. Need I say more?

"Excuse me? Is this the Cooper residence?" The man asked.

"Yes." Your father replied. "Is there a problem?"

"Our super sensing equipment has been going crazy in this neighborhood. It's strongest right here. In fact, it's the strongest it's ever been!" He explained. "Are you harboring supers in this house?"

"No! Why would we!" Your mother yelled. "Your equipment is probably malfunctioning."

"It's never done this before." The man said. "This piece of equipment is the best for finding supers."

"Well, then it must be pretty good then." Julian laughed. "We've been found out."

"Yep." You replied, laughing.

"Sir. I will ask you again, are you harboring supers!" The policeman yelled.

"Not technically." Your father replied. "Can you harbor yourself?" All four of you started to smile.

"Guys, let me take care of this one." Julian smiled evilly.

"Hang on." You interrupted. You snapped your finger. "There, he won't be going anywhere soon."

"What did you do?" The policeman yelled, trying to advance forward, only to be stopped.

"There's a force field there. You won't be escaping anytime soon." You grinned. "Julian, your turn."

"Thank's bro, or should I say, Fallen God." Julian laughed. As soon as the police man heard the name Fallen God, he froze. "Oh look, he's scared. Maybe he wants to go home to his mommy!" Julian taunted.

"Hey! It's not like we just did that!'' You laughed, reminding Julian that his parents were right behind him. "Guys, this might get a bit brutal."

"Julian, John, let me say one thing before you continue." Your father started. "I'm not a fan of violence. I don't think killing for the sake of killing makes the world any better. That being said, this man has constantly tried to arrest us, thinking that we were supers. He was right, but nobody believed him. Julian, have fun with this one."

"With pleasure." Julian's grin grew. "So, I see your familiar with the Fallen God?" No response. "I asked you a question! Respond!" Julian walked up to his face, and made a small green fireball in his hand.

"I've heard stories." The policeman stuttered in cowardice.

"What kind of stories?" Julian asked.

"Don't mind Julian guys." You whispered to your parents. "He likes to have fun with his victims."

"That's fine." Your mother replied. "This is somewhat entertaining. I could use some popcorn!"

"Okay." You snapped your fingers and made a bowl of popcorn appear. "Bottoms up!" You laughed.

"Hey! Save me some!" Julian yelled.

"We have more at home!" You responded. "Just continue your game."

"GAME?" The policeman screamed. "THIS IS A GAME TO YOU?"

"Yes. A very one sided one." Julian laughed maniacally. "Now, I want to validate any rumors about my brother and me, so talk!"

"Well. Didn't he destroy London?" The policeman whimpered.

"Yes. He did. It was quite easy too." Julian grinned.

"Yeah, the hardest part was making sure I didn't kill any supers." You interrupted.

"How powerful is he?" The policeman cried. "How powerful are you?"

"Think about it like this." Julian started. "We don't call ourselves 'God' for nothing." Julian laughed as his green fireball started to dance. "Now, there are too many options here. But I'll think I'll do this!" You watched as Julian stepped back and launched the fireball at the policeman, covering his body with flames. "Now this fire's special. It doesn't go out unless I want it to. And, it likes to burn slowly. Enjoy your death." Julian laughed evilly, watching the policeman writhe in pain. "It's a shame really. You didn't live to see what my brother can do."

"AAAAAAAAH!!!!" The policeman yelled.

"Oh, you want to know? Here! Let him show you." Julian laughed as he put out the flames on the policeman's body. The policeman was an inch away from death.

"Julian, you know that I don't want to kill him. I wanted you to." You started. "But, if you insist..." You smiled as you grabbed the policeman by the neck and lifted him up effortlessly. "See this hand?" You raised your other hand so the policeman could see it. He nodded. "This hand is going to do this!" You pointed it straight up, and shot a large blue laser directly into the sky. You then froze the laser in mid air. "See that? It's going to hit you in one minute. In the mean time, let me tell you a short story. It's the story of how I personally destroyed the planets of 3 different alien races. You might wonder, 'Hey? Why did you kill close to 20,000,000,000 people?' Well let me tell you." You leaned in close to the severely burned policeman. "I just felt like it." You smiled as you waved your hand down, sending the laser hurdling down into the policeman, vaporizing him. "Now that is the extent of my power." You smirked, lowering the force field. "Now, let's get out of here." You nodded over to Julian, who took your father's and mother's hand. You took their other hands, making a circle with you and Julian across from each other. "Hold on, it's going to be fast." You lifted yourself into the air, and took off faster than light.

Almost instantaneously, you arrived back at the palace. And just in time for lunch. "Thank you for flying Air Anderson! Have a nice day!" Julian laughed, seeing your parents slightly discombobulated.

"Sorry about the flight. Lightspeed travel is difficult the first time you do it." You smiled, healing the discombobulation (great word) with your powers.

"So, this is where you live?" Your father asked, looking at the large palace. "You compensating for something?"

"No, that's what I have my powers for!" You laughed as you led your parents into the palace. You headed directly for the dining room, where Leo, Stephanie and Diana were sitting.

"Johnny! Your back earlier than I thought you'd be!" Stephanie yelled as she ran to give you a hug and kiss. She didn't notice your parents at all.

"Stephanie Barteau? Is that really you?" Your mother asked.

"Mrs. Anderson?" She asked into the air. She turned and saw your parents. "It's really you! It's been so long!" She laughed.

"So, judging by that greeting, you're John's girlfriend." Your father butted in.

"Yep. We've got great chemistry!" She smiled.

"Well, I approve. I'm also guessing the other girl is Julian's?" Your father continued. "Again, I approve."

"Thank you Dad!" Julian smiled, sitting next to Diana. "Oh, you mentioned that you saw Leo. How did you know him?"

"We saw him flying, and we used some equipment we had in the secret room to find out who he was, and his relation to you guys." Your mother explained. "We wanted to find you guys, so we created t some kind of 'super tracker', for lack of a better term."

"Well, it's all good. Our family is reunited. Let's have some good lunch!" Julian smiled, preparing to eat. "What's for lunch?"

"Eddie said that it would be a classic." Leo replied. "I'm excited."

"Will there be enough? We have two more people." Diana asked.

"I'll take care of it." You smiled, heading for the kitchen. "Eddie, we have two more people today! My parents have come to live here." You told Eddie.

"That's great! Let me tweak this then!" Eddie smiled as you noticed everything get bigger. "There's my power at work!"

"Thank's Eddie!" You said as you headed back to the dining room. "Everything's taken care of, and it looks like today's lunch is Paella! And Stephanie, he's making a vegetarian one too!"

"YES!" Julian yelled. "The Paella was what made us decide to have Eddie be our personal chef!"

"Then I'm excited." Your father smiled. Finally, you have a completed family, and are truly happy. Lunch was spectacular. Every single bit of food was eaten. After lunch, you gave you parents the full tour, and showed them to their room. Once they got comfortable, you took them shopping, seeing how you accidentally left all of their stuff in Edinburgh. It was fine though. You were able to buy them everything they wanted/needed. Clothes, electronics, etc. Once you were finished, you went to your room, where you changed the alarm to your alarm clock. As you left your room, you saw Julian standing outside your door.

"I still want to fight." Julian said.

"Okay, meet me in my practice room in an hour. I have something I need to do right now." You agreed. "See you in an hour!"

"See ya."
1553312221221122112221122112112111111111.title: Reunion

choices: The next day.  Starting to talk to world leaders about Supernia
1553312221221122112221122112112111111111.content:
Warning. Some strong language.

“Julian?” You asked into the empty room. “I’m ready to fight. But, there’s something I would like to discuss first.”

“I’m listening.” Julian responded, coming out of the shadows, flames brandished.

“So. There’s something I’ve been meaning to do for a long time, and I think this is the best time to do it.” You started. “Julian, prepare for a powerup.”

“What do you mean?” He asked. “Why?”

“You’re my brother, and I want you to be ridiculously powerful, like me.” You smiled. “I can augment anyone’s powers but my own. I need special suits for that. I thought it would be fair for The Fallen God’s brother to be as godly has him.”

“I’m listening.” Julian started to grin.

“So, here’s what’s going to happen. You stand there.” You pointed right where he was standing. “Next, I’ll strengthen your fire to have potential to be hotter than physics would allow.” You immediately shot a beam of fire towards your brother, engulfing him in a beautiful blue fire. Rather than burn him, it felt soothing to him. “Now, fire is basically energy, and close to plasma. Thus, I’m giving you control over plasma and energy, both to a greater extent than myself.” You shot a beam of energy and plasma at your brother, joining the flames in the vortex surrounding him. “Finally, like me, you will be immortal, invincible, and ridiculously strong.” You ended by shooting him with a beam of pure white light. The vortex surrounding your brother looks directly out of a sci-fi film. Blue fire mixing with white light, orange plasma, and dark blue energy all swirled around him. “Oh, and you also have the red eyes when angry thing now.” You added a speck of red to the mix. “Now, wait a minute to absorb all of the power… NOW.” You forced your hands down, dissipating the vortex. You brother just stood there, motionless. “Julian? How do you feel?”

“Honestly John? I think this fight is going to be interesting.” He responded. “Much less one sided now.”

“Now that’s what I like to hear!” You smiled. “I estimated that the power I granted you will make you and I near equals. However, I still can erase your existence just in case.”

“Only for serious emergencies?” He asked.

“Yeah.” You grinned. “Now, let’s get our costumes on and do this thing!” You yelled as you changed your clothes into your suit. A blue aura surrounded your body. When Julian put on his costume, a green aura surrounded him. “I also made your costume augment your powers to the same degree as mine. 100 fold.”

“Thanks bro! Now, let’s fight!” Julian smiled.

“You know something funny Julian?” You chuckled. “This is the first time I’ve been worried in a fight.”

“Same.” Julian laughed. When the laughing subsided, there was nothing. Not a single sound was made in the room. After about one minute of this silence, Julian created a fireball in his hand. You could feel the intense heat coming off of it, making you start to sweat. After about a minute of holding it, he hurled it at you faster than you could have imagined. It hit you square in the chest, knocking you back a couple of feet.

“Ow. That hurt!” You yelled. “This is going to be interesting!” You looked at Julian who was preparing to fire an energy blast at you. Before he could even blink, you flew at him at top speed, punching him directly in the stomach with enough force to destroy a planet. On top of that, you augmented the punch by adding a strong gauntlet to your hand. You then followed the punch with an energy blast, sending your brother flying backwards. “How did that feel?”

“Honestly? Hurts like a bitch. But nothing I can’t deal with.” Your brother responded. “I didn’t expect any less from you. But, you missed something…” Immediately, you felt a sharp pain in your back as a narrow beam of energy hit you directly. “I can control energy now. Your energy blast certainly made that one fun!”

“Julian, you certainly are crafty.” You grinned. “However, you forgot one thing.” You shot freeze vision at him. “My heat, freeze and laser visions are all not energy.” Julian froze solid, encased in a block of ice. “I know that won’t hold you, but it still felt good.” You laughed as you watched Julian melt the ice.

“Again. Hurt like a bitch. Ice isn’t good for me.” Julian started. “It seems I have a weakness.”

“Well, there was nothing I could do about that one unfortunately. All pyrokines are inherently weak to ice.” You explained. “The only way to get rid of an ice weakness is to get rid of your fire powers. Even I couldn’t get around that one. In fact, I have a weakness!”

“Stop the fight!” Julian yelled. “What?”

“Yeah!” You started. “My weakness is that people can mess with my telekinesis, which is what my matter manipulation is. However, you and I both have enough powers to counter these weaknesses, unlike most. If people try to cancel my tk, I can still punch their face into oblivion, use laser vision or energy blasts. With you, you can melt the ice, and use energy to your advantage. So yes, we have weaknesses. But, we also can counter them much more easily than others.”

“Okay, back to the fight.” Julian said, taking in all of that information. Julian then flew up to you and punched you. However, you blocked. This super powered brawl soon became an expertly fought fist fight. Both of you were fighting like martial arts experts, smoothly dodging and countering every attack. After a minute of a Dragonball Z-esque fight, you both stopped, panting. “Wow, this is really taking a toll on me.”

“Yeah. Me too.” You agreed. “I think we’re even!”

“Yeah. Me too.” Julian chuckled, mimicking you. “Let’s call it a draw.”

“Sure.” You smiled, reaching out your hand for a handshake. Julian grabbed your hand, and you shook. “That was fun, albeit a bit painful.”

“Yeah. Next time, let’s not attack each other like we’re trying to kill each other.”

“That sounds like a good idea.” You laughed. “Now, I think it’s about time I start getting ready for dinner. I’m starving.”

“I hope it’s good!” Julian laughed, wrapping his arm around your shoulder.

“Same. Though, when is it not?” You laughed, walking out of the practice room.

“True.” You both laughed. “Seriously though, this was a battle of Gods.”

“Yep.” You agreed. “Two Gods are leaving this room together. It feels good to be God, doesn’t it?”

“Yeah.” Julian smiled, making green fire dance in his fingertips. “You might be the God of Matter, but I’m the God of Energy. Together, we’re unstoppable!”

“Julian. I just realized something.” You smiled, freezing while you reveal you epiphone. “With the kind of power we have, we could probably rule the Universe.”

“You’re thinking a bit too big here.” Julian laughed. “Let’s start with world domination first.” You both laughed as you went your separate ways to prepare for dinner.


End of Chapter
1553312221221122112221122112112111111111.title: A Battle of Gods

choices: Go to Area 51.  Your curiosity is too strong
1553312221221122112221122112112111111111.content:
Nothing in this reflect my political opinions. It's just a coincidence that I'm writing this on Election Day.

"I'll be back later. I have some business to attend to." You smiled, waving Stephanie goodbye.

"I'll miss you at lunch!" Stephanie replied.

"Tell Julian not to burn down the palace when I'm gone." You laughed. "He might need the reminder."

"Okay. Will do." Stephanie laughed back. "Bye!"

"See ya!" You yelled as you flew off to the USA. You'd made an appointment with the President for today at 9 AM. It was 8:55. Way more than enough time to get there. You decided to go for a full tuxedo, complete with bow tie and cummerbund, rather than your super suit. However, you could pull that out of thin air if need be. By 8:56, you were already in front of the White House. You landed with a soft thud in front of the main gate, where you were greeted by two members of the Secret Service. "Hello there!" You said with an innocent looking smile. "I have an appointment with President Davis."

"Okay, we're going to need any forms of identification to make sure you do." One of the men started. "We don't allow anyone into the White House."

"I understand." You began. "I'm the president of Supernia, Lord Jonathan Anderson. All the proof you need is in my hand." You smiled as you made your Supernia passport appear out of thin air. You gave it to the men, who were both awestruck at your use of your powers. "If you really want a show, then find me in a good mood. But don't drop by unannounced. I don't like surprises." You smiled.

"Well, everything seems to be in order. Right this way sir." The other man said, letting you into the White House. "Follow me." He started walking through the building, showing you to Roosevelt Room. "Here's the room. I hope you have a productive meeting."

"Me too." You agreed, making a bit of a scowl. You'd already decided the fate of Washington DC if the president doesn't meet your demands. Hopefully things won't explode today. You entered the room and saw a man sitting in a chair. He was about 50 years old, and looked like he was extremely anxious for this meeting. "Hello Mr. President." You started, trying to be as polite as you could. "I'm Lord Jonathan Anderson. President of Supernia."

"It's a pleasure to meet you Lord Anderson." The president began, reaching to shake your hand. "As you probably already know, I'm President Davis."

"It's a pleasure to meet you too Mr. President." You smiled, finishing the handshake.

"Now what brings you to Washington?" The president inquired.

"It's very simple really." You started. "Supernia is a brand new country. Thus, I felt that I needed to get the world acquainted with it. It's going to be here a while, so might as well know about it."

"So then, tell me about Supernia." President Davis demanded, but in a polite way.

"Well..." You told him about the political, economic and social structure of Supernia. "What do you think?"

"I'm impressed and flattered." The president smiled. "Thank you for modeling the government around our country's."

"You're welcome." You smiled back, glad that it doesn't look like things will be exploding any time soon. "Now, one more question. There are many former American citizens who are now citizens of Supernia. They left their friends and some of their family behind to join our nation. I was wondering if it would be possible to do two things. First, to set up a Supernian embassy here and an American embassy in Supernia, and to allow people with Supernia passports into America and to get visas, and visa versa."

"Well, that will have to go to congress, but I don't see any reason not to allow it." The president explained. "I personally will be for it. I'll get back to you as soon as the vote takes place."

"Thank you very much Mr. President. That is all I needed." You smiled, getting up from your seat. "Oh, if congress doesn't meet my very simple demands, then tell them that the Fallen God will say hello."

"Will do." The president agreed, shuddering. "By any chance, who is this Fallen God? Is he some renegade you have in Supernia to 'keep order'? I've only heard stories."

"No. It's much simpler." You started laughing. "It's me. Goodbye Mr. President. I hope I don't have to give congress a visit." You continued laughing as you left the White House. That was more successful than I anticipated. That guy certainly knows what's best for his country. You thought as you flew out of Washington DC.


End of Chapter
1553312221221122112221122112112111111111.title: America

choices: Skip to the end of the day
1553312221221122112221122112112111111111.content:
Warning. The usual stuff.

Canada was a complete success. The PM immediately called for the embassies to be built, and for Supernian passports to be accepted in Canada. Everything went perfectly. To celebrate your success, you decided to fly towards Area 51. Considering all of the conspiracy theories and stories, you had to see what exactly was going on in one of the most secretive places in the world. Who's going to stop you? You approached the No Fly Zone with a complete lack of caution, which the American Military was not happy about. You were flying quite slow, only around Mach 1, mainly to take in the scenery. As soon as you entered the airspace, you noticed missiles approaching you. With a flick of your wrist, your costume appeared on your body, replacing your tuxedo, and the familiar blue aura appeared. At the very next moment, another missile appeared on your trail. You decided to let them hit you. What could they do to you? The two missiles exploded in brilliant bright flashes and smoke. You stopped as soon as the missiles exploded to give an air of suspense to those who fired at you. After your break, you continued flying towards the air base.

Repeat this missile process 5 times, and you have the fly to Area 51. It got boring after the first 3 missiles. At one point, a plane flew next to you and started firing. You reflected the bullets back, destroying the plane and killing the pilot. Eventually, your leisurely stroll to Area 51 was complete, and you landed on Groom Lake, the salt flat next to the base. To add an extra bit of fun to the day for you, you decided to sneak around the base completely invisible. Maybe you could spook some people, or just eaves drop.

After a bit of a walk, you made it to the buildings of Area 51. When you got there, you were appalled by what you saw. Lines upon lines of super people being tested on. It looked as though the scientists were trying to extract what made people "super" from them. You were disgusted. Regular people should never have the authority to test on those superior to them. As you were planning the downfall of Area 51, you came up with an idea. You rushed into a corner where nobody would see you, became visible and disguised yourself as a scientist. You walked out of the corner and towards the supers. As you were muttering that you'd save them under your breath, another scientists walked over to you. "Hey! Are you supposed to be here?"

"Yes." You replied. "My shift is over here." You lied, trying to explain yourself.

"Sorry, we're under much more security than normal today." The scientist started.

"Why? Did something happen?" You asked, trying to play dumb.

"Rumor has it that something breached our air space and is in the base." He continued. "One guard speculated that it was the Fallen God that we've been hearing stories about. That's why we're on high alert."

"I though that guy was just a myth!" You laughed, finding it very difficult to stay in character.

"Well, we thought so too, but someone in the White House told us that he was there today. You can't argue with that, can you?" He explained.

"Yeah. I guess the rumors are true." You started.

"What do you mean true?" He interrupted. "Just because we know he's real doesn't mean all of the stories about him are true. Right?"

"Well, you could say that, but I know for a fact that the rumors are true." You smiled evilly. The other scientist looked very confused, and somewhat scared. "I can confirm that those rumors about me are true right now in fact!" You yelled as your costume formed on your body, your eyes shifting into your angry red. "Nobody without powers in this facility is living past today. The tests you've been doing on these super people are terrible. Now, for your sins, you will be punished!" You raised your arms in the air, preparing for a supernova. "Goodbye foolish mortals. This is what happens when you play with the wrath of a God." You laughed maniacally as you detonated your supernova, completely destroying the air base and all of the people here. The only things that survived were you and the supers you protected with force fields. "There, that should do it." You smiled as you quickly flew all of the supers being tested on to the best hospitals in Supernia. You could not believe that this was allowed to happen. However, you knew not to take it out on the US Government. Not even they knew what happened in Area 51.

After taking a breather to calm down, you continued on your quest to legalize Supernian travel and embassies in the countries of the world. Your next stop was Mexico. Maybe before your appointment, you'd stop at a beach in Cancun to relax for a bit, but you didn't care. Destroying Area 51 felt good. Too good.


End of Chapter
1553312221221122112221122112112111111111.title: Area 51 Revealed

15533122212211221122211221122.content:
You walked out of your cell. The blood being burnt off your arms by dancing fire wrapping itself around them. The lights in the corridor flickered as you approached, the air became stale as the fire around your arms burnt up the oxygen in the immediate area. You walked to the door, behind the barred door was the yard. You phased through the bars having them de materialize and re materialize around you. As the bars re formed behind you, you extinguished the fires around your arms as to not raise attention to your self.

"Hello" a child's voice said. You turned to see a twelve year old boy with shaggy brown hair, his orange jumpsuit was tied around his waist. From the Psychic aura he was emitting you could tell he was super , a pyrokinetic to be precise. "what are you in for?. I'm guessing using your powers in public." He said standing up from the wall and walking closer to you.

"No, mass murder of multiple accounts, possibly genocide depends on how good of a lawyer i can find." You answered shrugging.

"Cool, who did you kill?" the boy asked.

"Just most of London" you said Humbly.

"That's were i remembered your face from. The Financial times about a week ago. 'Leader of the Unofficial country 'Nation of super humans' is arrested after the war for the freedom of all supers ends with a barbaric use of gene targeted weaponry to demolish most of the iconic capital.' you're the leader of the NOSH, John Anderson." He said surprised."thank you for getting rid of that god awful city and its inhabitants. They locked me up for an undisclosed amount of time after I got pushed over and sparks flew out of my hand."

You snapped off your restraints and clicked your knuckles "I'd almost forgotten how bad it was here" you said cracking your neck.

"C'mon." you said as you started to walk towards the crowd of inmates around a podium with two supers on the top. He followed and was close behind you when you got to the group. You ducked and weaved through the crowd until you reached the front. On the podium there were three inmates one was on the floor with deep lacerations covering his body, the other two were standing over him triumphantly. "And that's what happens to those who disrespect us." the taller one said. These guys were the supers you saw from across the yard and now you are closer you can see that they are shadow manipulators . You stepped out from the crowd and moved towards them. They looked at you puzzled but when you stopped just in front of them and snapped your fingers causing them to be torn apart by your vectors. A red mist started coalescing around you as the two of them slowly turned into 1 cm X 1 cm cubes in a neat stack.

As the droplets condensed on yours and others jumpsuits others saw what you had done a wave of panic swept through the crowd. "all of you who are supers kill all those who are not ." you commanded as you atomized the stacks of meat behind you and formed a black metal suit of armor by re jigging the particles.

A bunch of lights erupted from the crowd as supers all over the yard started massacring the norms. streams of blood filled the air as people were crushed between walls of earth, others were burnt to a crisp as supers threw streams of fire across the yard. you stood there marveling in the chaos you had created as the last of the smoke settled and a set of about 10 people were left standing. the boy that you had spoken to early was one of them. the yard was torn up, burnt and littered with corpses that had been crushed turned into shreds or burnt. Some had even been strangled by the grass as one girl stood their with vines behind her and body's bound to the ground by grass.
15533122212211221122211221122.title: Jailhouse massacre

155331222122112211222112211221.content:
you came down from the podium and the supers walked towards you. "how do we get out of here... bar flying out?" you said to them, your voice slightly muffled by the helmet. "erm.. there's a security door about two floors down that leads to the helipad." the girl said lowering the vines and stopping in front of you. "then that's where we will go." you said as you motioned for the group to head towards the stairs with you at the vanguard. "so whats your story?"you asked the girl as you walked through the maze like tunnel to get to the door.

"well my name's Alice and as you've probably guessed I'm a dryad type super. I can manipulate plant life as long as I'm touching some. My mother and father reported me when they saw me playing with the flowers in my window box, you know making them move and shit, and since dryad types are rare they were moving me to a facility god knows where. I had nabbed some grass from the lawn outside my house so managed to break free but government trained supers are much harder to evade than norms so i got sent here." she explained as you navigated your way through the tunnels to the door.

It was a thick metal door, probably steel, you could tell from their psychic signatures that there were about 20 norms and 2 supers on the other side. there was a camera in the corner next to the door and it focused on you and your posse as you approached. you looked at the camera then sliced it in two with your vectors. the guards behind the door started taking cover as you approached the door and kicking it into the room with a single kick, the door crushed two of the guards on the opposite side of the room. there were tables flipped over and guards with SA80 bullpup assault rifles trained on you. you snapped your fingers and the four closest guards necks gushed crimson as they were decapitated by your vectors. Then the bullets started flying. from the 16 rifles trained on you over 150 rounds impacted your armor every second. despite this you still gestured for the other supers to go ahead and yet another bloodbath ensued. by the end there was vines coming out of the ground with the heads and torsos of several guards on them mostly impaled, some of them were burnt and others crushed against the walls by great slabs of the floor.

In the next room there was the supers. the first two of your group to rush into the next room got peppered with hypervelocity projectiles by the two supers standing guard in there. you shed your armor to become lighter and then darted in the room. the two supers countered your movement with a violent attack with their vectors. you dodged side to side and ducking under the telekinetic whips that slashed around you. you countered with your own vectors and coupled that with blasts of tk to knock them off balance. you managed to sneak one of your vectors through their defenses and slash one of their arms off. this caused their defenses to drop and you made short work of them by turning them into sashimi.
155331222122112211222112211221.title: Security raid

1553312221221122112221122112211.content:
You stood up and dusted yourself off as the other supers walked into the back room. You snapped your fingers and the the armour you had dropped in the other room disintegrated in dust. "can't have them finding that element." you said as you turned to face the last door that stood between all of you and freedom. You placed your hand in the centre of the door and it instantly turned to a fine powder that then arced into your arm. Light rays reflected off the tiny particles of metal as they darted across the doorframe and were absorbed into your arm. You stepped out and breathed in the fresh air... Before being peppered with bullets. Your mind raced as your Swiss cheese body fell to the ground. You thought about how they could hurt you so and why you couldn't detect them.

You felt your healing kick in quickly but eradicating over 200g of bullets is no easy feat. As your vision cleared you saw 5 norms standing around you wearing strange armour. It was like an exoskeleton in design but much thinner and had a full helmet complete with rebreathers and HUD. Two of them picked you up and a third slid a box beneath you. The last two had their guns trained on the door. As your mind healed you sent out telepathic SOS messages. The two that were picking you up lowered you into the box and closed the lid. They loaded you onto a chopper and took off.

As you came round you tried to feel out with your mind but were blocked by the box. You thought that the box must be lead lined so you slammed your hands on the side and they turned to dust but they met another metal, one you hadn't encountered before. This was the element that was blocking you. You repeatedly tried to read its makeup but it just kept repelling you. For the duration of the flight you sat there in the pitch black of the sarcophagus thinking about what to do. You disintegrated the rest of the lead and wood box that they had lifted you in and felt around inside the metal tomb and found several grills. You felt through them with your mind until you came to a valve made of this new metal.
The helicopter touched down gently on a pad somewhere. You heard a hissing sound and the valves opened up sending in a rush of knockout gas. You disassembled this before it reached your lungs and reformed it into the oxygen nitrogen mix of air. The coffin was pulled out of the chopper and carried by about 6 people. You thought that because you're not that heavy, so this metal must be quite dense. With a clang you were set down and the lid opened with a hiss. You kept your eyes closed to make them think the gas had worked. The light was bright enough to make the usual black of your eyelids a dark red.
1553312221221122112221122112211.title: Captured

15533122212211221122211221122111.content:
with the lid off the casket you could fully explore this place with your mind. it was a 40 ft by 50 ft room with a 10 ft tall ceiling, your 'box' was on a gurney in the middle beside a mortuary slab. there were several other metal trolleys around you and the slab with various instruments on them. There were 5 people in the room 3 of which were supers and the two just walking out the door were the norms. you felt telekinetic hands lift you out of the case and lay you down on the metal slab. then metal skinned hands from one of the supers morphed and cut off your jumpsuit leaving you in your underwear on the slab. the final one inserted and IV into your left hand.

the IV made your mind foggy but didn't knock you out as they were expecting, but they didn't know that as you were faking unconsciousness anyway. "test subject 0284. John Anderson. power: deity force. date 14/6/2019 time is now 16:58 and we are beginning by testing the subjects regenerative capabilities. we will begin with an incision from the elbow to the wrist." one of the supers recorded as he picked up a scalpel. you felt the cold chrome steel press against your skin. you decide to mess with them so you atomized the scalpel and the needle for the IV and let the metal powder just sit there instead of absorbing it.

"this is astonishing when we went to perform the incision the subject must have had a subconscious reaction to it and protected itself by turning the IV needle and the scalpel into a fine metal powder." he says pinching some of the powder and letting it drop in front of his eyes. the super that had put in the IV brought over another gurney and the telekinetic one lifted you up onto it. The one that had brought the gurney over grabbed a white set of scrubs with a number on them and pulled the trousers onto you and slid the shirt over your head then he wheeled you to the door and one of the guards took you along a corridor. they laid you down in a glass cell with guards on all sides.

after about ten minutes of assessing the area you decided to 'wake up'. So you scrunched up your eyes and then opened them. several guards looked at you astonished as you sat up on the glass bed. you looked around, the room was a light grey and you were in a glass box in the center of it. There were bright halogen lamps flooding the room with light. you stood up and walked around the cell. the floor itself was concrete and you used you matter manipulation to feel through it to see its composition, It was your standered Reinforced concrete. the walls were a tempered glass. you placed your hand on one to test and all the guards immediately trained their rifles on you. You removed your hand from it and held your hands in the air until they put their rifles down. On the desk in the cell there was a leaflet with a schedule on it: 6 o'clock breakfast, 7 o'clock shower, 7:15 o'clock school, 12 o'clock lunch, 1 o'clock power training, 5 o'clock dinner, 5-7 o'clock freetime 8-10 o'clock lockdown, 10 o'clock Bed.

you observed this schedule intrigued and you looked up at the clock on the wall "dammit i missed dinner." you thought out loud. you looked around at the guards and said. "come on not even a smile. alright tough crowd... feels like a German trip.".

you sat down in the glass chair and waited a few minutes then a buzzer went off and a glass canopy was lowered from the ceiling down just above the door to the cell and glass walls slid up from the floor enclosing the door. Part of the concrete at the other end slid down to reveal a large white common room. the glass door of the cell opened and you got up and walked down the new created glass corridor and out of your cell room.
15533122212211221122211221122111.title: The Facility

155331222122112211222112211221111.content:
Somehow the lights in this common room were brighter than the lights in your cell. the walls, floor and ceiling were a bleak white. In the room there were a group of tables and chairs and a small open area. The room was full of children and teens all of whom were supers, they were all wearing white scrubs much like yours. Almost all of them turned their heads to see what the massive psychic presence was that came into the room. Some looked at you puzzled, but others just turned away. Three of them walked over to you. One of the three was a boy younger than all of you around 9 and had flame red hair with deep brown eyes and freckles. The next was a girl was around your age and had her long brown hair tied in high ponytail, she had brilliant blue eyes and a piercing gaze. the third was a shorter girl with short brown hair and mid brown eyes, her face was baby like and flawless.

The tall girl talked first. "hey, what's your name?" she asks.

"John" you reply.

"Cool, That's George, this is Katy,and I'm Hayley" She replied.

"Hello"George said and Katy just blushed when you looked at her. you smiled at her and turned back to Hayley.

"so what exactly is this place?" you asked looking around and sending out psychic feelers.

"this is the facility... at least that's all any of us have been able to scrape off the guards by talking to them." Hayley answered "oh and no use trying to go through the walls with you feelers. They're all lined with that black metal shit."

"OK" you acknowledged and retracted the psychic tendrils. "so what are your powers?" you asked as you were unable to get a clear reading from them. "well I'm a shadowkine." Hayley said.

"I'm pyrokine" George said.

"I'm telekine" Katy said in a hushed voice whilst trying not to make eye contact with you.

"cool" you said noticing Katy's aversion to your gaze. Hayley also noticed the blushing on Katy's part and quickly changed the subject.

"C'mon, I'll show you around" She turns and motions for you to follow. You walk to the group of tables and chairs. A few other supers start to look at you due to your immense psychic energy. "Over here is the communal area" she motioned towards the tables and chairs. Their was another super who took an interest in you, he had silvery spiky hair and crystal blue eyes. He was a little shorter than you but his hair made him taller. Hayley saw the boy looking your way and called out to him "Hey Owen, Come over here" The boy walked over passively and then at the last minute sprung into life and jumped over the table separating you and the rest of the hall. "Hello." He quickly articulated. You were a little taken aback by the sudden burst of movement and speech. "Erm... Hi" you uttered.
"Owen don't torment him!" Hayley Snapped. At this he coward back a few steps and walked with the others behind you and Hayley.
155331222122112211222112211221111.title: The Group

1553312221221122112221122112211111.content:
Hayley showed you around the rest of the room, there wasn't much apart from a TV, some consoles and a cafeteria. "this way" she pointed down a hall off the main room. After that she briskly walked down the corridor, you and the group followed close to heel. "down here is the training room and exercise yard." Hayley points forwards and towards a large open doorway leading out into another large space. A breeze rushed over the group and at this you shot your vectors forwards. Hayley, Katy, George and Owen winced as you let lose your psychic energies. Just as the immaterial hands reached the boundary line a pulse echoed through them and back to you sending shooting pains right into the very deepest part of your mind.

There was a ringing in your ears as you came to and you saw two new faces hanging over you. One was a boy around 7 with raven black hair and heterochromia iridum with the left eye being gold and the right a pale grey. The other was the dryad from the prison and her long black hair bushed over your face. "You are stupid. There's a neutralization field over that door, You should have died." the boy explained as you saw his gold eye track across your body piercing you with psychic vibrations. He was scanning you. When he got to your brain you could see his face gawp in amazement. "This is incredible, your brain is alight with activity, not only that it is ridiculously efficient it must be your brain having a completely open psychic channel." he continued to scan each individual neuron.
You sat up and saw the rest of the group gathered around. Using your TK you floated up and onto your feet. "Boy, whats your name?" you snap, with no humour in your voice whatsoever. "Fred" he jumped at your sudden change of attitude.

"Fred, what powers the field?" you ask clicking your neck.

"A few indentured supers" He answered guessing what you were about to do. You smiled and in a blink of an eye you were at the other end of the corridor closely followed by multiple sonic booms and the corridor being ripped apart. you slammed your hands on the door frame and felt the swirling energies of the field. As they energies drifted apart for a second you sent a massive pulse of energy into the door frame causing a crackle of lightening from were your hands meet the frame. There was a power surge throughout the entire facility and you could feel three large psychic presences go out as there minds were overloaded. you could feel a massive rush of energy as all the fields in the facility shut down.

Guards pushed past the group at the end of the corridor and as you turned you saw Owen start to smile nefariously. He cracked each knuckle in his hands and promptly his hands shriveled into just bones bound together by his mind. He jumped up behind one guard and caught the bare skin on the back of the guards neck. In a second the guards clothes dropped down and a skull rolled out from the helmet. As he landed in a three point. The other guard began to turn as Owen pointed his skeletal right hand at him index finger outstretched. Before the guard could pull any of his fire together a black arc crackled out of Owens finger and scorched through the helmet visor and boiling the Guards brain. A red bubble filled liquid spurted out of the hole in the guards face.
1553312221221122112221122112211111.title: Take down the facility

15533122212211221122211221122111111.content:
Sirens wailed as guards flooded the common room. They weren't expecting any resistance from the general populace, they only thought that there were a small group of rebels but they were severely incorrect. Almost every super in that hall wanted to escape and now the opportunity had arisen they were not going to skip out. A girl stepped out from the crowd and stamped her foot on the ground sending the floor beneath three of the guards shooting up into the roof taking them all by surprise and leaving three big red splotches. At this your group took it as a signal to attack as you recovered from venting such a huge amount of energy into the system. Katy sprung into life and with her TK she blasted her self into the air and did a backflip as she brought her heel down into one of the guards throats. She landed in a three point then lurched forwards and flung her arms apart tearing a guard in two lengthways.

Owen sauntered casually behind a pair of unsuspecting guards standing on the sidelines and in a flash his skeletal appendages were thrust into the bare skin. In a second their skin had shrivelled much in the same way as Owens hands had when he activated his ability. Less the a second later the two guards fell into a heap of clothes, bones and dust. Owen smiled as he let the black sparks jump between the bones in his hand unaware that behind him a guard was readying his vectors and lining up a shot that would cleave Owens head from his shoulders. Before that shot could go off however the geokinetic girl that had started the fight used the concrete as a trampoline to launch herself into the guard at almost 30 mph. She caught her foot beneath the guards jaw and rode him down to the ground, skidding a good 10 metres before coming to a stop. "Thanks Shannon." Owen waved with his skeletal hands, she waved back and jumped into the fight.

George rushed up behind two guards and snapped his fingers sending two white hot streams of fire ripping through their chests. They slumped off to the side as he jumped in between the two of them. Before he hit the ground in front of five guards George snapped his fingers again and this time created two six thousand degree fireballs, turning the air to plasma as they passed through it. He slammed the fireballs into the ground instantly turning it to bubbling lava. He pushed more heat into the concrete causing the pool of lava to spread underneath the guards and they swiftly caught alight and sunk into the lava, screaming in agony as they charred down to the bone. George let out a malicious chuckle and beamed psychotically at the doomed guards.

Hayley sent a spear of shadows into a guard sending him flying back, embedding itself in another guard and sending the two guards sprawling. Swiftly she created a spiked whip like weapon from the shadows and in one swing cleaved four guards in half, sending blood spraying over the white concrete floor. A host of guards ran towards her at inhuman speed and she reacted not a millisecond to late as she slammed her hand into the floor sending a pulse of shadows erupting from Hayleys hand, knocking the five guards off their feet. Quickly she sent a large spike through each of their chests, impaling them and causing them to rise about a metre off the ground in a gruesome Vlad the impaler style spectacle.
15533122212211221122211221122111111.title: Landslide victory

choices: What in hell is that black metal stuff
155331222122112211222112211221111111.content:
The dust settled as you stumbled out still half drained from your actions earlier. You saw the carnage that had ensued you overloading the suppression system. There were charred skeletons half embedded in the concrete and the concrete itself was folded and not as flat and neat as the rest was. All in all there were a hundred and six dead guards and only twelve dead child supers. You saw Katy and the other telekinetic supers lift all the bodys up and separate them into piles, one for guards and one for the child supers, the guards pile was significantly larger and they were thrown randomly into a pile whether as the child supers were laid out in two rows of six with white sheets covering them respectfully. Shannon stamped her foot and the skeletons were pushed out of the concrete. They crumpled into piles as the sinew holding them together finally gave way. Before she could try and gather up the bones you disintegrated them and absorbed the matter. Shannon turned and called out to the group "hey he's here"

Owen was the first to get to you, his hands still skeletal but now they had padded leather gloves on, "so what do ya' think?" he blurted out, wiggiling his gloved phallanges beside his head.
"that is a very interesting power, what is it a void based power using the life void created by sucking all the life from your hands to force out others energy and into an internal battery to be used later?" you asked flicking through your memory to find the one other person with this power. You found it and her name was Alice Cain and she had died in the war, Alice was one of your commanders and had been caught in an I.E.D. He was gobsmacked by your question and was utterly bewildered by how much you knew of his ability.

Hayley and the others got to you next and Katy looked worried about how tired and drained you looked. She was telling you to go sit down but you just couldn't take your eyes off the big blood splatter on the side of her face. You tapped the side of yours and she brought her white sleeve up to her face and it came down red. Katy quickly grabbed Hayleys arm and before she could object Katy had wiped the considerable amount of blood from the side of her face. Hayley looked at it and wiped on the nearest dead guard, this did not work as she only succeeded in getting more blood on her sleeve. "damn It" she mumbled as she rubbed her sleeve.
"give me a minute" you mumbled and you walked slightly unevenly towards the large pile of corpses. You placed one hand on the pile and closed your eyes to focus. Within ten seconds the corpses started to disintegrate and the dust that once made them up arced around the pile and into your back giving you energy, revitalizing you and restoring your energy. In another twenty seconds the entire pile had been disintegrated and you were back at full strength.

The group stood in awe as the twenty foot tall pile of bodies turned to an ultra fine dust and moved like iron filings to a magnet towards you and if there were any obstacles the particals would bow around them in a smooth flowing motion. They saw you straighten up from the slight slouch you had to being bolt upright. You twisted your head to one side, several loud snapping sound emminated from your neck, then you twisted it the other way, again several loud snapping sounds could be heard.

Now you were back at full strength and had nothing blocking you abilities you sent out a large scanning wave, those that had any TK based ability, e.g. Geokinesis, Pyrokinesis, Hydrokinesis, Telekinesis and Telepathy, Winced a little as it passed through them. The wave rebounded off a layer of that new metal. You deliberately walked up to one of the concrete walls and slammed your palm into it causing a ripple to be sent through the stone and a second later almost all of the concrete within a three metre radius cracked and burst off. Panels of this unknown material layered the inside of the wall. You lightly placed your hand on them and then tried to read this materials chemical makeup, but all you got back was static.
155331222122112211222112211221111111.title: Static

1553312221221122112221122112211111111.content:
You flew up in the air to see if there were any windows, there weren't so you landed softly beside the group. "so is there any way out, because the backup generator won't last more than another two hours?" you ask scratching your head.

"there is the front door, if we can get into the tunnels" Katy suggested.

"yeah, but that might involve going through a door reinforced with that metal." George refuted. They continued passing suggestions as you thought of something, you had been attempting to read it as an element, what if it wasn't an element but something else. You pondered that for a few moments and then turned tail and quickly walked to the wall with the missing concrete. You placed your hands on the metal and pumped energy into it, scanning it as if it were hundreds of different kinds of object. All but one of the scans returned static. The one that did identified this matter not as matter but as energy condensed down and bound to the material world, Black matter.

Armed with this new knowledge you passed energy into the material and got a pulse back, you repeated that and it sped up rapidly until finally the plate that your hands were on melted and floated to your skin and begun being absorbed into you. You turned to see the group still arguing . "guys" you spoke and they all turned to see the last of the black matter be absorbed into your skin.

"you did it" Hayley came bolting forwards. You nodded and then sent out a scanning pulse into the gap. The facility was deep underground, probably around two hundred feet deep, and it was beneath a city but you couldn't tell which one from here. You rushed over to the cell you had left and obliterated the door with a single punch. The glass room you were in before you had gone into the common room sat in the centre with a three metre walkway around the edge. Across the room on the opposite side of the glass chamber there was a sliding door.

You walked around the cell to the slightly different panel on the wall opposite the door to the common room. As you placed one hand on it you could feel the same cold metal as was in the walls and then began to pass psychic waves into it to break it down. The black matter responded in the same way and broke down in a similar way to before. In its place stood a thin titanuim door, you didn't bother breaking down this one so you just cleaved it in twain with your vectors. The two peices of metal fell with a clang and you stepped over them into a grey corridor with flashing red lights lining the walls.

Down at the end of the corridor some tables were flipped over and there were guns jutting out from every orifice of the barricade that had been hastily thrown together. You waved at them and you could smell the perspiration emanating from the guards, many of whom were not supers. Just for show you snapped your fingers and created a red delicious apple materialize in your hand. You took a bite from the apple with a crunch as you began to casually saunter towards the shoddy fortifications. The tension soared among the guards as you came within 10 metres but then an officer shouted "FIRE!" and every rifle protruding from the metal table pile started spitting metal slugs towards you.

In the nano seconds before the bullets reached you, the apple was thrown in and you held your hands out stopping all the bullets mere inches away from your hands. Once the guards had ran out of bullets you turned your palms to face you and then flicked them round back to face the guards, sending the bullets darting into the guards. Blood sprayed out in a crimson deluge coating the corridor in a thick coating of vitea.
1553312221221122112221122112211111111.title: Black metal = Energy

15533122212211221122211221122111111111.content:
You caught the apple and took another bite as you were walking towards the barricade. You pushed than aside with your TK and walks past the dripping walls. The corridors continued for miles in each direction and had many levels. You lead your little party through the labyrinth and eventually reached a stairway. You stood at the centre and sighed. "This is getting tedious." Then you raised your hand and a small ball of light appeared in your hand. You had been thinking about the physics of a directed fusion blast and now was your time to try it out. You splayed your hand apart and the ball instantly spread out into a beam that continued up and through the facility above, about the width that the stairway was.



A strong smell of ozone filled the area around the beam you had made. You looked up and saw the night sky at the top of the burnt out shaft. You sent out a scanning pulse and found that you were beneath Seattle. To be precise the shaft you had made was in the Olympic national park less than 60 km from Seattle's city centre. "Alright, every body gather round." You said and all the supers gathered around you and you formed a force field. You lifted up everybody using the force field and flew them all out and past Seattle. You took them to a point 40km away from the city and a good few km up and left them in the field as you flew back to the facility and created another supernova. This time big enough to consume both the entire facility but also Seattle. You left the needle though.



It was almost morning by the time you got back to the Nosh. Not everybody can handle going at a fraction of the speed of light. You dropped everyone off and headed for the Capitol tower. As you walked through the doors the guards greeted you with a salute of punching their fists forward. You waved your hands and your jumpsuit turned into your black carapace and regal cape. You stood beneath a shaft that was made especially for flyers and shot up it at mach 2. You gently stepped onto the penthouse floor and burst through the doors. Julian came out of his room, yawning, looking like he just woke up. When he saw you he was instantly awake. "Hey, Bro." He greeted as he matched your march towards you office.



"Do we still occupy Britain?" You asked.



"Yeah, Our troops are currently helping with the evacuation of the last remaining supers. Actually we took that prison you where shipped to less than a day ago. We now hold all but the north of Scotland." He briefed you.



"Start the process of annexation. Use empaths to determine whether the norms harbour anti-super views. If they do Put them to work. If they don’t register them as citizens and they can live in piece. I will forgive those that only harbour anti-super views for the two occasions of me using the supernova blast." You ordered. Julian was surprised by this.



"Two occasions...." He said stunned.



"I destroyed Seattle. There was a military facility beneath it." You answered.
15533122212211221122211221122111111111.title: Escape

155332.content: You really can't make up your mind can you.
155332.title: Heres another choice

1553321.content: Are you the last or are there more vampires?
1553321.title: vampirism

15533212.content: is it just small colony or an entire civilization?
15533212.title: There are others

155332121.content: Were you born a vampire or a human?
155332121.title: stature

15533212111.content:
Chose a character:

Kyle.
Kyle is a 12 year old Vampire. He has black hair and Red eyes. He has extremely pale skin and Half inch long retractable fangs. Recently he has chose to become a full vampire early due to his parents death and him needing to fill his fathers role as the lord of blood, the highest ranked vampire besides the progenitor. He is a pureblood and one of the more powerful vampires in existence despite his age. He has a younger brother (Lucas 5) and a younger sister (Jenifer 10). The estate were they live is a large Georgian manor with about 10 acres of well kept land.

Jordan.
Jordan is a 17 year old vampire. He has Crimson hair and pitch black eyes. He has pale skin and is just starting to mature to vampirehood so his fangs are still developing. He is of a lower noble lineage and without a turned fouling the bloodline for about 7 generations they are on there way up in the world. He has a mother (Mary 251), father (Gordon 348) and a younger sister (Kelly 13). They live in a outer city mansion of a more modern design with large flat surfaces and a spacious garden.

Michael.
Michael is a 6 year old vampire. With white hair and Red eyes. He has extremely pale skin and half inch long retractable fangs. He is the offspring of the progenitor so his vampiric features are prominent from young. He has a father (Greg 10000+) a mother (Patricia 681).he lives in a large and sprawling underground complex.
15533212111.title: male

choices: you arrive on time and safely
155332121111.content:
You were sitting in your large study reading report on the locations of all known hunters and there covers. *knock* *knock* "Come in" you said not looking up from the screen. The door opened and your butler, Demitri, entered. Demitri was a standard born vampire of two generations and working for you is the highest someone of his station could achieve and he is extremely proud of it. "Sir, there is a noble requesting to see you." Demitri reported with a bow.
"send him in." you told him as you switched off the monitor but left the computer running so you could pick up on it later. The noble walked in and saluted before he sat down in a chair on the other side of your desk. "good morning lord Nocturne" he said whilst saluting.
"good morning to you too. Now what brings you here?" you inquired as you lent on your desk spinning a pen between your thumb and fore finger. "I've come with a buissnes invitation to the Progenitors complex." he said placing a envelope with the seal of immortality on the back making the letter unopenable to anyone but the intended recipient. "jeez it's always buissnes with grandpa" you uttered as you picked up the envelope and tapped on the seal. This opened it up allowing you to remove the contents of a letter and a key card.

you took one look at the letter and knew it was written by the progenitor. You skimmed through it and was quite surprised to see a sealed letter be written in such vagueness. "Demitri. Get the car were visiting Grandpa." you commanded him and he just bowed and walked off to the garage. "You may leave now." you told the noble and he stood up, saluted then walked back to his car in the drive way. 'What could Grandpa want? His letter didn't say anything about it.' you thought to your self as you got up and got your sunglasses and coat. You the proceeded outside were Demitri was waiting with the Bentley continental R ,probably the most discreet model you owned. He opened left rear door for you and you sat inside. Demitri then sat in the drivers seat wearing his sunglasses. You then drove off for the progenitors compound.
155332121111.title: Kyle

1553321211112.content:
Demitri stopped at a set of traffic lights in a particularly deprived neighbourhood. A group of humans on the corner looked at the car, talked amongst themselves then nodded. Two of them crossed the street, another stopped in the middle of the road right in front of the car. A forth positioned himself behind the vehicle and the final two were standing opposite the ones that had crossed. "I believe we are being car jacked sir." Demitri divulged the obvious.
"Don't do anything. I'm thirsty." you said with a smile.

"Now!!" shouted one of the car jackers and they all ran towards the car. The two closest to the drivers side pulled Demitri out whilst you were being told to empty out your wallet at gunpoint. You just turned to face the car jacker and pinched the end of his gun barrel flat. The car jacker was near oblivious to that and he then went to punch you but the punch never made contact. His fist just hovered there about an inch away from your face, it then moved around slowly so that the fore arm was just In front of your mouth. You opened your mouth revealing your fangs, then bit down on his arm. The sweet red liquid from his arm gushed down your throat, quickly quenching that light burning sensation at the back of your throat, you didn't hold back in feeding so he soon went limp and you soon heard his heart stop beating.

You stood up outside the open door and looked at each of the car jackers with blood trailing out of your mouth. They all stared at you horrified. you flited around each of the car jackers tearing out there jugulars with your index finger. The blood that squirted out painted the road crimson, passerbys stopped in horror at the twelve year old boy covered in blood and surrounded by stiffs with gaping holes at there necks. You dragged the body out from the car then went to retrieve a severely dazed Demitri from a pile of corpses.
1553321211112.title: A *bite* to eat.

15533212111121.content:
After driving out of the slums you soon reached the Neo district, a district were the more upper class members of society live. The gleaming street lights reflected off the blacked out windows of your antique car like stars in an inky black sky as you drove through the quiet streets of Neo at night. The houses alongside were large mansions of a very modern design. you checked the watch on your wrist, quite surprised to find that the journey from the estates to the Neo took 4 hours. Your surprise was short lived as the gates to the old district loomed overhead.

A security guard came to the drivers side window and knocked on it. Demitri wound down the window using a pair of glasses to hide his red glowing eyes. "sorry sir but I'm afraid I'm going to have to ask you to step out of your vehicle, we have orders to search every vehicle that comes through here." the guard said.
Demitri looked back at you "Master what do you wish, shall we cooperate?".
" yes, I don't want to get into trouble with humans wielding a PR-18 (Plasma rifle) " you replied while pointing at the Ak 47 sized assault rifle in the hands of the security guard.

Demitri opened the door and stepped out of the car his tall and wirery frame meant that he was almost a head taller than the security guard which unnerved the guard a bit. Demitri turned back to the car and opened the door for you. The brisk night air was crisp as you stepped out of the car but for a second your vampiric senses picked up a strong whiff of the tangy, sweet scent of Cruro or Blood. Unfortunately mea this resulted with your eyes going full power and there light shone through the sunglasses you were wearing alerting the guards to think that you were a mutant.

"Shit" you Bluntly put it as all of the guards at the gate raised the guns to shoot but before they could Demitri stepped In front of you ready to take the pulses from the fully automatic plasma rifles. "you would protect a Mutant." one of the guards asked him. Demitri turned to face you and asked "shall we toy with them or just kill them?"
"we are late as it is, so the later" you responded coldly. Following this command Demitri turned to face the guards, he closed his eyes and removed his glasses.

Upon opening his eyes fire started to pour out of all of the guards mouth and eyes as there very brain was incinerated. You chuckled quietly to your self 'I do like this one.' recalling the last time he used this on some burglars. once the flames died down, you and Demitri were off again
15533212111121.title: The gate

choices: go to a human school and live in the human world
live in the human world but don't go to school
155332121111211.content:
The streets of the old district varied greatly from the streets of the Neo by the fact they were pre revolution. The car pulled into a multi story garage and drove down the ramps to the bottom level. The car pulled into a reserved parking spot. The edges of the parking space flashed blue and then the entire space started to lower into the ground. Once the car had gone under by about 4 feet a roof slid over the top sealing the roof.

The elevator continued going down the deep shaft until it reached a huge cavern. Deep beneath, on the cavern floor was a forgotten complex of strange buildings. This was the last remenents of the previous civilization to rule earth right before the wars that in turn created the vampires. The car came to a rest on a tall building were an elder vampire awaited you. Demitri got out of the car and opened your door. "welcome lord Nocturne, I trust you had a pleasant trip." The elder greeted noticing the blood staining your white shirt red and the small pieces of charcoaled flesh in the grill of the car. "I am going to need a pint of O- before the day is done." you said handing your coat and glasses to Demitri.

The elder led you through the Ornately carved arches that led up to the Progenitors office/throne room. When you reached the towering door the elder said "only those with a key card may enter." Demitri was about to protest but you raised your hand to stop him, then you stepped through the door. The space inside was huge, with bookshelves lined with data slates made from long lost tech holding the records of the vampire race over the past 10000 years. You had only been here once before, although you saw grandpa all of the time, when you asked for permission to take full vampirism early due to mom and dads deaths.

You stopped In front of a desk with a vampire sitting behind it that looked about 25 but actually topped 10500. "Hello Kyle." the progenitor greeted you. " Hi grandpa." you said as he gestured for you to sit down opposite him. You sat down and he leaned forwards " let's get straight down to business. I am planning a reveal of vampires to humans and I want you to gain the trust of some human children, so you are going to..."
155332121111211.title: mission

1553321211112111.content:
"... Go to a human school and live in the human world for about a year, that should be enough time to intergrate more vampires into the rest of society." Granpa drabbled on. You were dumbstruck by his lengthy announcement.
"why me?" you asked after a few seconds of thinking.
" because I can trust you the most." he awnsered back quickly "and your the only childlike vampire we have that's part of the nobility."
"alright, were am I going?" you asked.
" to a juinor high in the just outside the shinjuku ghetto called ayakashi juinor high, it's considered a Bridge school as it has low scholarship requirements but the tutition fees are slightly above average, there will be both the rich and the poor there." he said as if reading off the dictionary meaning.
"when am I leaving?" you said thinking what to pack.
"Tommorrow, and take your brother and sister with you, also Demitri will serve as an acting father. For his role in all this I will promote him to pureblood by infusing a drop of my blood directly into his veins." he said and this time you could tell he was reading off his computer.
"Where will we be staying?" I asked curiously.
"a regular sized human house with a direct and secure link between here and it." he said with you far less confused than when you started.
1553321211112111.title: go to a human school and live in the human world

15533212111121111.content:
"I only have one more question, why now? earlier I had a guard try to shoot me for my eyes glowing red." you said letting your eyes glow like a crimson flame.
"Humans have recently stabalized themselves governmently and they are approaching the tech level that the previous human civilization was at before its collapse." Grandfather said making his point by gesturing to the ancient tech that surrounds you.

You left the hall and walked back up to the tower with Demitri following closely behind.
