You hear the beep of the school bus outside so you kiss your mom on the cheek grab your bag and rush onto the bus. You were a senior at your juinor high and the high school is right next door so they share a bus service. At the back of the bus you see a bunch of seniors from the high school, they look at you then start talking amongst themselves. The bus ride continued as usual up until it was time to get off when the group bolted to the exit before anybody else. You thought nothing of it as they were just standing by the entrance and letting people past until they got to you. "hey kid give us your phone and your wallet" one of the group demanded.
"no, why should I" you replied trying to push past them, they grabbed your arm and pulled you back.
"Because if you don't we'll beat you up" the senior that grabbed your arm said.

After a few seconds of you refusing they started to punch you until you felt a hot rush run through your veins in your right arm. You didn't know what to do so you lashed out landing punches on all of them in one strike sending them flying. You looked down at your arm to see the veins were glowing, you didn't know what to do so you grabbed a jumper out of your bag and stuck it on you grabbed a marker pen and drew on the veins on your hand so to blank out the glowing as you didn't know how to turn it off (you didn't know about your eyes). You proceeded into school hopping nobody would notice the one inch of glowing vein visible on the back of your neck. The day continued remarkably normally considering what happened until maths last period, you hated maths and was terrible at it.

You went into your classroom and sat down at your desk. You got out your books and waited quietly whilst the rest of the class chatted amongst yourselves occasionally pointing at you and sniggering slightly. When the teacher came in he started writing some algebraic equations down on the board, these made your brain hurt. You scratched your head and wished you could be the smartest person in the world. You felt a hot rush around the back of your head and then your head felt 'roomy' as you took one look up at the board and figured out the equations in an instant then recording them to memory.

"so who's figured it out yet?" the teacher asked.
"507.98" you said with your hand up. The teacher looked at you with amazement.
"Correct" he said quiet astonished as you had never gotten a algebraic awnser correct yet.
"that isn't all the awnser yet sir, it is x -[y^3 /zx12" you continued. At this the teacher had to sit down as one of his academically worst student had just solved a quadratic equation with a degree level awnser. You continued through The lesson until the bell rang when he called you up to the front to speak with him. "what happened today luke?"the teacher asked.
"I don't know sir , I just seemed to know how to figure everything out."you replied.
"well if you keep this up im sure that we'll have to move you to gifted and talented." he said with a smile "go on you'll miss your bus"
"thank you sir"you thanked him as you were leaving the classroom to go home.

155332221112221111222211222.content:
"no don't" the British super who was bound with a large metal helmet on. "if we can get were we are going we can make a better strike, remove our bindings when I give the signal."
"ok" you replied. The ride was long and it got exceedingly hot in the back of the heavily modded meat wagon. It was about three hours before the truck came to a stop. The back of the van was opened up and a dozen soldiers rushed and walked us out into the open.

The field we were in was massive and surronding it was a military camp. "alright you maggots, stand in line." a colonel shouted as he walked down the line of supers all bound in diffrent ways. "you are now soldiers of the united states military empowered division. Thanks to your special 'gifts' you will serve as the driving force behind the military and its payback at the Russians and the Chinese for what the did in Vietnam and the other wars." he added gruffly.
"but sir we were the ones to use bio weapons like agent orange first." a woman super said. The colonel was not pleased, he walked over to her "DID I SAY YOU I SAY YOU COULD SPEAK MAGGOT!" he shouted right in her face.

After this they sperated the adults from the children the the males from the females. They removed the bindings from everyone and gave them a uniform. They sent all the supers to there tents to get changed. After everyone was changed the lieutenant for your platoon of around 30 boys ranging from 5 to 16 strode in with pride. "attention!" he commanded and at that moment the entire team fell silent. "today you will begin your new lives in the military. You are no longer any old grouping of supers you are now the 50th Childs empowered platoon. We will begin training tommorrow at 0600 hours, until then you will be interviewed to determine your mental state then after that you have a free afternoon, saver it as it will be your last for a very long time." the lieutenant explained then turned tail and strode out.

They then started calling names out and slowly they interviewed the entire platoon. When it came to your name it was nearly midday. You walked out of the tent and into another were as psychiatrist was sitting on the opposite chair. "Luke Hamish, am I correct." she said as you sat down In the chair. " yes." you awnsered simply.
"good, now I'm going to ask you a couple of questions and you are going to awnser them truthfully." she says as she starts to scribble down some notes on her clipboard.

Do you awnser them truthfully?

"yes." you said noticing the pattern in the questions.
"who was it?" she asked again monotonusly.
"my mother." you said realising that this was a test for pschopathy.
"do you lie often?" she asked.
"quite." you said with a sly smile.

15533222111222111122221122211.content:
"your a psychopath, but not like that's much diffrent 80% of all supers develop psychopathy within the first month." she revealed. the door was opened by a gaurd outside and you got up and walked off to get some lunch and socialize.

"rise and shine troops we start basic combat training today." the lieutenant said as he pushed open the barracks door. The youngest wiped the sleep from there eyes then they got changed from there trainset pjs the camp had provided to there uniforms whilst the older kids slept in there uniforms. They led us out and lined us up. "today you will learn hand to hand combat. Now who has experience with this already?" he addressed. "I do" you said using your hyper intellect to recall a few martial arts from some movies and books.
"good, to the front soldier." he said pointing next to a 25 year old male soldier.

Once you were up there "ok now you are going to spar now this means no powers or speed." the lieutenant said " and fight" within a second he had thrown a punch but you saw this coming so you flipped over the top of him and struck him in the back in multiple place s killing him instantly. "what the hell!" the lieutenant shouted "you weren't meant to kill him!"
"sorry." you said almost sarcastically."my hand slipped."
"that's no excuse for killing another soldier in training, no meals for a week." the lieutenant punished.
"fine with me." you said with a sassy tone.

155332222.title: yet more

1553322221.content:
You walked home with your friends every day from school but they had all left early today to get ready for the party tonight. You walked out into the road. The 18 wheelers horn was the last thing you heard as it came racing towards you at 60mph, pancakeing you against the front.

You breathed in sharply as you sat up from lying on the floor. You quickly got up to see what all the commotion was about. An 18 wheeler had hit a kid walking home from school, killing him. you walked out next to the truck and picked up the bag of the kid to see who it was who got hit. You opened up the satchel and pulled out a few books, they all had the same name on the front ,Gregory Malwakin. At that moment you had a very sudden realisation, your name was Gregory Malwakin. You dropped the books back into the bag and fastened the latch on the satchel and put the strap over your shoulder. You walked over to the truck on the side of the road just as the police were arriving.

your body was unrecognisable. As it had mainly been crushed by the force of the impact and your skin had burst along the edges with your organs hanging out the sides. You ran away from this gruesome sight all the way home.
